T02TD2200E:88a-1: n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni a'arya n'a ma tantra t'i k'a / bod skad du /
T02TD2200E:88a-2: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rnam par bshad pa /
T02TD2200E:88a-3: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2200E:88a-4: bden pa gnyis la rab gnas shing //
T02TD2200E:88a-5: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel pa'i //
T02TD2200E:88a-6: mgon po sgrib pa kun spangs yon tan ma lus kun gyi bdag po de //
T02TD2200E:88a-7: shes rab thabs kyis mya ngan mtha' spangs nas //
T02TD2200E:88a-8: snying rje chen pos sems can mun 'thibs pa //
T02TD2200E:88a-9: mun ma mthong sgom rtsa ba nyon mongs zhi mdzad pa//
T02TD2200E:88a-10: gsang sngags sdud mdzad mi g-yo bcom ldan 'das //
T02TD2200E:88a-11: thugs rje bsnyel ba med la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2200E:88a-12: gang gis gsal bar byas pa de rnams byas pa ma yin tshig don skyon dang ldan //
T02TD2200E:88a-13: de nas 'dir ni gsang ba don las dga' ba skyes //
T02TD2200E:88a-14: tshig gi skyon bral man ngag nyams dang ldan ;
T02TD2200E:88a-15: / sh'akya'i rigs kyi man ngag don ldan rgyas par bstan pa las //
T02TD2200E:88a-16: shes rab dmigs ma phyed pas bshad zin bstan pa dag / de dag sman 'gyur 'dir ni gsal bar byas //
T02TD2200E:88a-17: des ni nyi zla dag dang mthun pa'i dam chos 'di //
T02TD2200E:88a-18: thugs rje nye bar bsngos pa yis //
T02TD2200E:88b-0: @88b snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyis su //
T02TD2200E:88b-1: rtsa rgyud man ngag bshad par bya //
T02TD2200E:88b-2: rtsa rgyud rang bzhin don rnams la //
T02TD2200E:88b-3: sde tshan lnga lnga nyi shu lnga //
T02TD2200E:88b-4: ya sha mtha' bcas rtsa ba ldan //
T02TD2200E:88b-5: thabs dang shes rab yi ge gnyis ldan gsum du 'dus //
T02TD2200E:88b-6: brjod bya rtogs byed tshig gi don //
T02TD2200E:88b-7: rtsa ba bshad dang tshig gi don phyir ma //
T02TD2200E:88b-8: phyi ma mchog dang ma log bzhi ru ston //
T02TD2200E:88b-9: bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang chen pos //
T02TD2200E:88b-10: 'og min chos dbyings pha brang du //
T02TD2200E:88b-11: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas //
T02TD2200E:88b-12: sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs rgyas //
T02TD2200E:88b-13: ma lus pa yi stobs kyis su //
T02TD2200E:88b-14: sku de rnam pa gsum gyi don ;
T02TD2200E:88b-15: / thob byed rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi lam //
T02TD2200E:88b-16: dngos byed 'bras bu'i lam yin te //
T02TD2200E:88b-17: rgyu ni tshig de dran sogs pa'i /
T02TD2200E:88b-18: phyir zhing dro ba'i rang bzhin te //
T02TD2200E:88b-19: nyon mongs ma tshig zhi rtse mo'o //
T02TD2200E:88b-20: phyir mi ldog dang 'jig rten mthar stobs lnga //
T02TD2200E:88b-21: dbang po lnga yi rang bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:88b-22: byang chub yan lag bdun po ni //
T02TD2200E:88b-23: mthong lam skad cig bcu drug go //
T02TD2200E:88b-24: sa dang bsgom lam mthar phyin 'bras bu'o //
T02TD2200E:88b-25: dngos byed lam ni 'bras bu sngas //
T02TD2200E:88b-26: byin gyis brlabs pas sngags mthu yon tan no //
T02TD2200E:88b-27: lam ma bgrod pas 'bras bu med //
T02TD2200E:88b-28: dper na gru gzings bskyod pa yis //
T02TD2200E:88b-29: rin chen mchog ni thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:88b-30: brjod bya ston pa'i tshig gis kyang //
T02TD2200E:88b-32: des na sngags ni gsang sngags lam //
T02TD2200E:88b-33: lam ma bgrod par gsal byed 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:88b-34: des na brjod bya'i khyad kyi nus pa yin no //
T02TD2200E:88b-35: 'di skad la sogs pa bshad pa mdzes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2200E:88b-39: mchog gi dgos pa bstan par bya ste /
T02TD2200E:88b-40: brjod bya dngos po med pa'i tshig ni bstan kyang rtogs pa sngon du gtong ba rnams 'jug par mi 'gyur te /
T02TD2200E:88b-41: drung la dkar po spyi ni 'jug gi bye brag la 'khrul pa bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:88b-42: des na skyon yod pa'i phyir chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams mi 'jug go //
T02TD2200E:88b-43: des na byis pa dang smyon pa dang mchog yin zhing gzhan la sogs pa ni dgos pa med snyam pa'am /
T02TD2200E:88b-44: 'di nyid kyi ma yin snyam pas mi 'jug ste /
T02TD2200E:88b-45: tshig dang don thams cad kyi 'brel pa dang /
T02TD2200E:89a-2: dgos pa'i yang dgos pa rnams gtan la phab pa sngon du byas nas mchod pas na /
T02TD2200E:89a-3: 'di nyid 'brel pa la sogs pa yang brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:89a-4: de bzhin du 'brel pa dang brjod pa bshad par cis te mi bya /
T02TD2200E:89a-5: smyon pa'i tshig bzhin du mi 'brel pa'am /
T02TD2200E:89a-6: mo gsham la sogs pa la don med par 'dod pa'i zhen pas tshig chad par 'gyur bas ma ning gi gzugs la zhen pa'i 'dod pa rnams ci nas kyang tshig chad par 'gyur zhes brtags nas 'jug par mi 'gyur ba nyid do //
T02TD2200E:89a-7: de bas na 'jug pa'i yan lag gi gtso bo yin pa'i phyir te /
T02TD2200E:89a-8: thog ma nyid du dgos pa brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:89a-9: de gang las shes par bya ba'i phyir /
T02TD2200E:89a-10: dgos pa dang 'brel pa brjod par bya ba yang bstan to //
T02TD2200E:89a-11: de nas dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bstan to //
T02TD2200E:89a-12: brjod bya ji lta bu snyam pa la /
T02TD2200E:89a-13: 'di ltar lam dang 'bras bu brjod bya'i 'bras bur rtog ces bya'o //
T02TD2200E:89a-14: brjod bya ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes so //
T02TD2200E:89a-15: de yang sgras drangs nas blo la dngos su snang ba sa dngos kyi brjod bya zhes pa nas snang ba zhen pa'i brjod byas /
T02TD2200E:89a-16: sgra drangs pa'i tshig gi don 'dis brjod bya rtogs pas brjod bya mtshon par byed pa'i tshig la yang brjod bya 'di'i don zhes 'brel par bya ste /
T02TD2200E:89a-17: 'di ltar lam la brten pas 'bras bu thob ste /
T02TD2200E:89a-18: de ni de dang 'gal ba'i chos spong bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2200E:89a-19: gal te de ltar yin du zad mod /
T02TD2200E:89a-20: de nyid bstan pa ci phyir snyam nas des na 'dir sgra'i tshogs lam brten par nam yang rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2200E:89a-21: ci'i phyir gal te byung na ni thams cad gzhung gi tshogs la sogs pa la mi ltos par 'gyur na ni don med do //
T02TD2200E:89a-22: gal te yod na thams cad skye ba'am /
T02TD2200E:89a-23: rkyen med pa rtogs pa thar par gyur pa las /
T02TD2200E:89a-24: rgyu med 'bras bu skye bar rigs pa med do //
T02TD2200E:89a-25: nam mkha'i me tog bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:89a-26: des na rgyu la rang bzhin du bye brag gyur pa med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02TD2200E:89a-27: phyi ma ltar na yang 'ba' zhig pa rnams la ni 'ba' zhig rang las gzhan nus pa'i phyir mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2200E:89a-28: 'bras bu yan lag rgyu la ma tshang bar byung na ni /
T02TD2200E:89b-0: dus thams @89b cad du 'bras bu 'byung ste /
T02TD2200E:89b-1: de ni med pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:89b-2: de bas na gzhung gi tshogs med na brjod bya'i rtogs pa mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2200E:89b-3: de bzhin du gzhung thabs yin pa dang gzhung yang brjod bya'i don rtogs pa thabs las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa'o //
T02TD2200E:89b-4: de bas na gzhung gi tshogs 'di brjod bya shugs kyis rtogs bya yin la //
T02TD2200E:89b-5: dgos pa ni thabs las 'byung ba yin la /
T02TD2200E:89b-6: nyed kyis 'brel te de dag rang nyid kyis 'brel pa'o //
T02TD2200E:89b-7: de'i phyir gzhung bstan pas blang dor ni dgos pa yin no //
T02TD2200E:89b-9: rang gi don phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te /
T02TD2200E:89b-10: lam gyi rim pas tshogs lam dang drod la sogs par 'byung ngo //
T02TD2200E:89b-11: tshu rol gyi ye shes dang mthong sgom la sogs pas 'brel zhes te de ni mthar phyin pa yang bzung ste /
T02TD2200E:89b-12: rigs kyi bu rnams dgos pa'o //
T02TD2200E:89b-13: de ni me dang du ba bzhin du de dang de las 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ste //
T02TD2200E:89b-14: thabs dang thabs las 'byung ba'i tshul gyis 'brel pa'o //
T02TD2200E:89b-15: des na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya rtsa nas byang ba ni rang don no //
T02TD2200E:89b-16: 'brel pa la yang de nyid do //
T02TD2200E:89b-17: sa bon dang bcas pa ston pa ni rang don phun sum tshog pa'o //
T02TD2200E:89b-18: des na dgos pa'i dgos pa yang //
T02TD2200E:89b-19: gzhan la brten gzhan mu stegs dang //
T02TD2200E:89b-20: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /
T02TD2200E:89b-22: phyag rgya chen pos gzhan mthar phyin pa la sogs pa ni /
T02TD2200E:89b-24: des na chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams la ni /
T02TD2200E:89b-26: dgos pa'i dgos pa bstan to //
T02TD2200E:89b-27: de nas brjod bya dang 'brel pa dang /
T02TD2200E:89b-28: dgos pa dang 'bras bu dgos pa'i dgos pa la sogs pa bzhi nges par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:89b-29: gang zag dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams ni /
T02TD2200E:89b-30: srid pa'i mtsho nges par bzung nas /
T02TD2200E:89b-31: sangs rgyas kyi bka' nges par 'jug pa'i phyir bstan mi dgos so //
T02TD2200E:89b-32: de ltar brjod bya dang dgos pa brjod nas /
T02TD2200E:89b-33: yan lag bstan pa ni gzhung don to //
T02TD2200E:89b-34: de la 'di skad bdag gis thos pa zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
T02TD2200E:89b-35: sbud [?] pa po'i tshig tu smos te /
T02TD2200E:89b-36: 'di skad smras pa thos zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2200E:90a-1: gyi tshe gzhan gyis thos par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:90a-2: thos pa ni bdag kho nas thos te /
T02TD2200E:90a-5: 'di ni ri rab rtse rtsa rgyud nyi khri sum stong kha nas thos pa'o //
T02TD2200E:90a-6: des ni thos par dka' ba dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-7: thos pa mang ba la sogs pa yang yongs su bzung ngo //
T02TD2200E:90a-8: gzhan ni b'a r'a na s'ir bden pa bzhi la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2200E:90a-10: sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa'i gtso 'khor tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:90a-11: 'di skad bdag gis thos ni rgyal ba mar me mdzad dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-14: rnam rgyal la sogs pas las thos pa ste sngon dang da lta la sogs pa dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-15: bar du yang thos pa ste /
T02TD2200E:90a-16: gtso bo dang 'khor tha mi dad par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:90a-17: tha mi dad na rang gi tshig dang 'gal lo //
T02TD2200E:90a-18: gcig pa yin pa'i phyir snyam pa la //
T02TD2200E:90a-20: kun rdzob tu snang ba thams cad kyang 'khrul pa mi bden pa sgyu ma yin pas don ni stong pa nyid kho na'o zhes rgyud las gsungs pa yin no //
T02TD2200E:90a-21: tha dad kyang mi 'gal te bde bar gshags pa la skyon gnyis med de /
T02TD2200E:90a-22: thams cad zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa khams dang skye mched bral bas dus thams cad bdag dang bdag gis stong ba nyid du med /
T02TD2200E:90a-23: zla ba dang chu bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:90a-24: de bas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ni /
T02TD2200E:90a-25: phyag na rdo rje nyid dang rang bzhin gcig pas /
T02TD2200E:90a-26: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdul bya ni /
T02TD2200E:90a-27: snang bas snang zhes bstan te me long rkyen gyis gzugs rang las gnyis su snang ba'o //
T02TD2200E:90a-28: de bzhin du sems bskyed pa'i smon lam dang snying rje chen pos sems can gzhug pa'i ched du ston pa dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-29: 'khor dang ldan ba dang lam dang dri za'i gzugs dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-30: phung po dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-31: khams dang rnam par byang pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02TD2200E:90a-33: mang du bstan pa rnams ni /
T02TD2200E:90a-34: sems can gzhug pa'i ched yin pas thos zhes bya /
T02TD2200E:90a-35: gzhan nas theg pa bstan pa sems can gzhug pa'i ched du lags /
T02TD2200E:90a-36: theg pa med cing 'bras bu med //
T02TD2200E:90a-38: des na phyag na rdo rje la khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas thos pa ste /
T02TD2200E:90b-0: @90b gtso 'khor tha mi dad par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:90b-1: gcig pa'i phyir thos pa dang 'gal snyam pa la /
T02TD2200E:90b-3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang phyag na rdo rjer snang la /
T02TD2200E:90b-4: de yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba ru snang ngo //
T02TD2200E:90b-5: 'o na de dngos su snang ngam mi snang ba yin /
T02TD2200E:90b-6: sbrul pa yin nam ma sbrul pa yin //
T02TD2200E:90b-7: snang zhing sprul pa yin na sangs rgyas ma yin te /
T02TD2200E:90b-8: dngos po tha dad du snang zhing shes pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:90b-9: bcom ldan 'das ni log pa'i shes pa dang ste /
T02TD2200E:90b-10: sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang khyad med do //
T02TD2200E:90b-11: de'i phyir de ni sangs rgyas su blta bar mi bya'o //
T02TD2200E:90b-12: sbrul pa ma yin na snang bar mi rigs so //
T02TD2200E:90b-14: rgyu med 'bras bu snang ba'i phyir //
T02TD2200E:90b-15: ri bong rva sogs snang bar rigs //
T02TD2200E:90b-17: bden te log pa'i shes pa dang ldan na de gnyis 'byung gi / de med pa'i phyir de mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD2200E:90b-18: dngos su sbrul yang mi sto 'dul ba'i dus la bab pa'i phyir /
T02TD2200E:90b-19: de'i rang bzhin der snang ba'o //
T02TD2200E:90b-20: ma sprul yang rang nyid de'i tshe des 'dul la rnam par rgyal bar snang ba'o //
T02TD2200E:90b-21: de nas bka' la bar med pa'i phyir rang gis thos pa dang yang sdud pa pos thos zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:90b-22: 'dir sems can gdul byas ma rtogs par ston pa dang sdud pa po tha dad du bya ba med do //
T02TD2200E:90b-23: smon lam dang thugs rje dpag tu med pa'i 'gro don 'byung ba'i phyir thos zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2200E:90b-24: des na skyon de gnyis mi 'byung ste //
T02TD2200E:90b-25: de ni skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:90b-26: dus kyang de ste bde'i tshe thos //
T02TD2200E:90b-27: gzhan gyi tshe gzhan thos pa ste dus kyang de'i tshe zhes bstan to //
T02TD2200E:90b-28: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa ni ae wang m'a ya zhes 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'byung ba lnga rigs dang ye shes lnga dang sgra dang ske mched dang /
T02TD2200E:90b-32: rtsa lnga dang dbang dang dga' ba la sogs pa la shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:90b-33: de dag bstan pa'i yan lag ni //
T02TD2200E:90b-34: phyi nang mthar thug rnam pa gsum //
T02TD2200E:90b-35: ci bzhin min dang ji bzhin sgra //
T02TD2200E:90b-36: dgongs pas bshad dang dgongs pa min //
T02TD2200E:90b-37: drang ba'i don dang nges pa'i don //
T02TD2200E:91a-2: nang ni rtsa rlung byang chub sems //
T02TD2200E:91a-3: rtsa lnga gtum mo'i man ngag go //
T02TD2200E:91a-4: mthar thug mthong lam ye shes te //
T02TD2200E:91a-5: dpe ye shes gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i lam bcu gnyis ni dngos po bral ba des na bral ba'i shes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:91a-6: gzhan yang phung po lnga dang ;
T02TD2200E:91a-12: brda min skye bo thal ba'i tshig / dgos pa ma yin zhes su bya //
T02TD2200E:91a-13: shu kra su tra ma nu ha ra dang //
T02TD2200E:91a-15: byang sems kyis sems can phal pa rnams thugs rje zag bcas thams cad skyob pa'o //
T02TD2200E:91a-16: sngags dang shes pa ma lus yongs su 'dzin rgyud ni //
T02TD2200E:91a-17: 'khor ba brgyud de chos nyid byang chub sems //
T02TD2200E:91a-18: 'di yang gnas pa ma lus stong pas 'dzin par byed //
T02TD2200E:91a-21: sems can ma lus gsad par bya //
T02TD2200E:91a-22: ma byin len dang brdzun smra dang //
T02TD2200E:91a-23: de lta de ltar sems can don //
T02TD2200E:91a-24: 'dod chags la sogs spang bas spyad //
T02TD2200E:91a-25: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD2200E:91a-26: sangs rgyas bstan pa rgyu yi phyir //
T02TD2200E:91a-27: sems can thams cad bsad na yang //
T02TD2200E:91a-28: de la sdig pas mi gos so //
T02TD2200E:91a-29: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD2200E:91a-30: sangs rgyas kun la sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2200E:91a-31: gzhan gyi nor rnams phrog na yang //
T02TD2200E:91a-32: de la sdig pas mi gos so //
T02TD2200E:91a-33: 'dod chags lta bu'i bde ba med //
T02TD2200E:91a-34: de ni rgyal ba rnams la phul //
T02TD2200E:91a-35: sems can don du gzhan bud med //
T02TD2200E:91a-36: bsten pas bsod nams thob par 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:91a-37: sems can kun la phan don du //
T02TD2200E:91a-38: sangs rgyas bstan pa'i rgyu yi phyir //
T02TD2200E:91a-39: mi dge bcu sogs spyad pa yang //
T02TD2200E:91a-40: bsod nams rnam mang 'phel zhes gsungs //
T02TD2200E:91a-41: snyoms par 'jug pa nas bzung ba //
T02TD2200E:91a-42: pha dang ma ni gsad par bya //
T02TD2200E:91a-43: rgyal po ngan pa bkur mi bya //
T02TD2200E:91a-44: bram ze'i grong khyer gzhom par bya //
T02TD2200E:91a-45: des kyang grong bar gsungs pa ste //
T02TD2200E:91a-46: dgos pa bshad pa zhes ni bya //
T02TD2200E:91a-47: drang ba'i don ni theg pa gsum dang dgu ru bstan pa'o //
T02TD2200E:91a-48: yod pas nyam thos rang rgyal rnams ni smos //
T02TD2200E:91b-0: phra rab rdzas su 'dod pa nyan thos @91b rnams ;
T02TD2200E:91b-1: / byang chub sems dpa' de ni byis pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:91b-2: med par zhen cing chags par 'dod pa'i byis pa ste //
T02TD2200E:91b-3: theg pa dman pa log pa'i shes pa ste //
T02TD2200E:91b-4: de kho de la de yi theg bstan pa //
T02TD2200E:91b-6: yang dag don dang ldan gyur pa //
T02TD2200E:91b-7: stong nyid rang bzhin lhug pa ni //
T02TD2200E:91b-8: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dngos //
T02TD2200E:91b-9: blang dor med pa thar pa'i lam //
T02TD2200E:91b-11: byang chub sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa ni bcing ba'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-12: tshul khrims nas ye shes kyi bar du ni bcing ba'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-16: bdag med pa ni bcing ba'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-17: ci'i phyir zhe na bdag thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:91b-18: de nas bral ba'i chos la yang rigs kyi bu'am /
T02TD2200E:91b-19: rigs kyi bu mo bslab par mi bya'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-20: des na mu stegs pa la sogs pa'i bdag lta dang /
T02TD2200E:91b-21: byis pa rnams kyi yod pa'i shes pa rnams ni gzhom pa sla'o ;
T02TD2200E:91b-23: rig stong la sogs pa phyogs bral gyi bdag rnams zhi gzhom par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir 'khor ba las mi thar ba bstan to //
T02TD2200E:91b-24: des na 'dod pa lam du byas pa'i bcing ba'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-25: bya ba med pa thob pa med pa ni nges pa'i don zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-26: de skad gsungs pa yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD2200E:91b-27: de ni dus phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-28: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu //
T02TD2200E:91b-29: shin tu dben pa shin tu yongs dag pa //
T02TD2200E:91b-30: zhes pas gnas phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa yin te /
T02TD2200E:91b-31: gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba ni ri rab rtse mo ste /
T02TD2200E:91b-32: de na ni gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang /
T02TD2200E:91b-33: nor bu bzad po dang lngas rtsen la sogs pa ste /
T02TD2200E:91b-34: gnod sbyin gos sngon can gyi 'khor du bstan te /
T02TD2200E:91b-35: de na ni gnod spyin ma rungs pa gzhan yang yod pa ste /
T02TD2200E:91b-36: de rnams yod pa ni gnod sbyin thams cad yongs su rgyu ba zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-37: shin tu dben pa ni stug po bkod pa'i gnas te /
T02TD2200E:91b-38: 'di yang dpe shel gsal ba'i nang du chud pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba ni /
T02TD2200E:91b-39: gzhal yas khang 'dug pa ni ma lus pa'i lhun gyis grub pa'i rgyan dang ldan zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:91b-40: de na ye shes chen po ston pa bzhugs te /
T02TD2200E:92a-0: 'khor dang chos la sogs pa gcig tu bzhugs te me dang tsha ba @92a * //
T02TD2200E:92a-2: rang bzhin gcig par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:92a-4: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba /
T02TD2200E:92a-5: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis las kyi khro bo'i 'bar bskur ba zhes bya bar gnas gsum du ston pa gsum tha mi dad par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92a-6: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2200E:92a-7: gnod sbyin ma rungs pa de rnams kyi gtso bo sprul sku lag na rdo rjes 'dul bar bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92a-8: de la ni sprul gyi rgyan ni /
T02TD2200E:92a-9: nyid las tha mi dad pa'i 'khor gyi gnod sbyin rnams ston pa'i gzi brjid kyis /
T02TD2200E:92a-10: nye ba'i 'khor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sprul pa'i sbrul gyi rgyan btab ces bya bar bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92a-11: stag gi sham thabs dang gos sngon po bla gos rnams ni /
T02TD2200E:92a-12: gnod sbyin bred pa'i stobs kyis skyabs kyi 'od la phul zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:92a-13: dus gsum bde gshegs zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2200E:92a-14: byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje bcu la gnas pa'i tshe /
T02TD2200E:92a-15: padma stong dang ldan pa'i dbus su bzhag ste /
T02TD2200E:92a-16: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi stong pa nyid kyi rdo rje phyung nas phyag na rdo rje thugs kyi bdag por sdud pa por dbang bskur zhing bka' gnang nas /
T02TD2200E:92a-17: las thams cad bting phan chad kyis zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:92a-20: mi me bdag gi phung po 'dra ba /
T02TD2200E:92a-22: 'jigs pa'i nga ro can zhes pa la ma che ba gtsigs pas ni log par rtog pa'i bdud rnams za zhing 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2200E:92a-23: yid khros pas ni don snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin te /
T02TD2200E:92a-24: kun rdzob tu khro bo'i cha byad do //
T02TD2200E:92a-25: mig me mdag gi phung po ni /
T02TD2200E:92a-26: las gnyis la 'jug / rang smin pa'i las dang bltas pa tsam gyis 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2200E:92a-27: dbugs me lce ltar 'bar ba ni /
T02TD2200E:92a-28: smin ma dang sga tsam gyis 'dul bar bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92a-29: 'jigs pa'i nga ro ni ngag gi skyon bzhi dang bral zhing yid kyi zug rdu 'don zhing /
T02TD2200E:92a-30: h'um dang phat kyi sgra sgrogs pas 'khor rnams skrag pa'o //
T02TD2200E:92a-31: lag pa dang rkang pa klu nor rgyas kyis brgyan pa /
T02TD2200E:92b-0: klu nag po se ral @92b khar thogs pa /
T02TD2200E:92b-1: klu nag po dang nye dga' bos snyan cha brgyan pa zhes pa ni /
T02TD2200E:92b-2: lag pa la sbrul nag po dang ser pos brgyan par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-3: rkang pa la sbrul nag pos brgyan pa'i ska rags dmar po byas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-4: se ral kha ni kla khengs po'i rigs kyis ga shar byas pa'o//
T02TD2200E:92b-5: klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo'i ming yin la /
T02TD2200E:92b-6: de dang 'dra ba'i sbrul dkar pos snyan cha brgyan par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92b-7: sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i chod pan thogs pa /
T02TD2200E:92b-8: sbrul gdug pa 'bar ba za zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:92b-9: sbrul 'bar ba rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa ni /
T02TD2200E:92b-10: dbul nor bu rin po ches brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-11: 'bar ba ni nag po la sogs pa'i kha dog bzhin /
T02TD2200E:92b-12: sbrul rin po che dang ldan pas dbul brgyan par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92b-13: gdug pa za ba ni zhal du sbrul nag po gsol bar bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92b-14: des kyang gtso bo 'dod chags rnam par dag par dang /
T02TD2200E:92b-15: tshul khrims nyams pa'i skyon dang bral zhing /
T02TD2200E:92b-16: phyi rol gyi klu'i rigs drug 'dul ba'i rtags su bstan //
T02TD2200E:92b-18: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa /
T02TD2200E:92b-19: ya sogs ma mchu man pa /
T02TD2200E:92b-20: gshin rje'i cha byad can zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2200E:92b-21: bzhin rgyas pa ni stong pa nyid kyi don rgyas pas gdong gi 'phel ba ste ;
T02TD2200E:92b-22: lha la sogs pa gdul bya 'dul bar bstan no /
T02TD2200E:92b-23: ya sos ma mchu mnan pa ni /
T02TD2200E:92b-24: ya sos ma mchu'i steng du phyin pa ste /
T02TD2200E:92b-25: bye brag tu srin po 'dul ba'i rtags so //
T02TD2200E:92b-26: smin ma dpral bar bsdus pa ni /
T02TD2200E:92b-27: khro gnyer gsum dpral bar 'dug pa sku gsum dang ldan pa'i rtags /
T02TD2200E:92b-28: gshin rje'i cha byang can ni khro bo mi'u thung gi gzugs 'dra ba'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-29: des ni gshin rje'i rigs 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-33: lag pa brdabs pa'i sgras 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02TD2200E:92b-35: sprul pa glog pas myur ba'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-36: sbrul za ba ni sbrul klu'i nad ngan 'dra bas 'dod chags kyi gdung ba sel ba'o //
T02TD2200E:92b-37: gsus pa che ba ni gsus khyim che ba ste /
T02TD2200E:92b-38: stong pa nyid kyang bstan to //
T02TD2200E:92b-39: lag pa brdabs pa ni gtso bo lag pa rdo rje dang ldan pas ma rungs pa 'jigs par byed pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93a-1: po 'dab bzangs ska rags su bcings pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-2: aa la la zhes sgrogs par byed pa zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:93a-3: 'dab bzangs ni sbrul dmar po'i ska rags su bcings pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-4: aa la la ni de 'dra'i rgyan cha la ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD2200E:93a-5: de sgrogs pa ni sgra sgrogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93a-6: rgya mtsho'i za bas su dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong yod pa rkang pa'i phrul mor phyin pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-7: dbang po dang nyi ma phrag pa la khur zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:93a-8: rgya mtsho la dpag tshad brgyad khri yod pas phyag na rdo rje'i bus mo nub pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-9: sku byin po la nyis 'bum drug khri yod pa zhes pa ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-10: sprul pa'i sku'i bong tshad bstan to //
T02TD2200E:93a-11: dbang po dang nyi ma ni thabs shes rab kyi ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-12: nang gtso bo bzhugs zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:93a-13: yang na gtso bo'i phrag pa la nye zla rgyu ba ste zhes pa'i tshad do //
T02TD2200E:93a-14: la la na re lha'i dbang po'i phrag pa la nyi zla rgyu ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-15: de'i steng na phyag na rdo rje bzhugs zhes pa ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-17: klu thams cad rlag par byed pa ;
T02TD2200E:93a-18: gad rgyangs chen po dgod pas kun du 'khrugs par byed pa zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:93a-19: klu'i rigs kyi bdag po la sogs pa brlag pa'i phyir /
T02TD2200E:93a-20: ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra drangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:93a-21: gad rgyangs ni ha sa de ba ta'i sgra bsgrags pas klu thams cad sngags shing brgyal te sha rus khro bo'i zhal du stobs zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93a-22: klu thams cad 'ching bar byed pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-23: 'byung po thams cad 'gugs shing zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2200E:93a-24: 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la sogs pa 'gugs shing bcing ba ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-25: lcags kyu'i sbyor bas bkug nas /
T02TD2200E:93a-26: dkar gsum dang mngar gsum dang ldan pa'i gtor ma sbyin zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93a-27: klu thams cad ces pa ni /
T02TD2200E:93a-28: bcing ba ni gcod mi nus te /
T02TD2200E:93a-29: gzhan gshin rje dang 'byung po sbyin yang yongs su bzung ba ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-30: sbyor ba thams cad gcod par mdzad pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-31: sbyor ba thams cad zlog par mdzad pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-32: sbyor ba thams cad gnon par mdzad pa /
T02TD2200E:93a-33: yon tan ma lus pa'i bdag po de zhes pa la sbyor pa ni phyi'i drug dang /
T02TD2200E:93a-34: khrag dang sngags kyis byas pa'i gnod pa ste /
T02TD2200E:93a-35: gzhan gyis byas pa'i rig sngags tshur mi tshugs par bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93a-36: sbyor ba bzlog pa ni rang bsrung ba dang pha rol rang bzlog pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-0: sbyor ba gnon pa ni phar la @93b bzlog pa'i 'khor lo thod pa mi mthun pas gnon zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-1: tshig de gsum yang zab pa'i phyir bla ma'i man ngag la rag las par bya ba'i phyir bshad par mi bya'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-2: yon tan ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-3: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-4: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-5: byams pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-6: des kyang gnas khyad par can na ston pa yon tan dang ldan pa bzhugs par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:93b-7: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-8: gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad ces pas 'khor phun sum tshogs par bstan te /
T02TD2200E:93b-9: rang gi 'khor ni sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang lha dang mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-10: gzhan yang rigs lnga'i khro bo dang lha mo dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-11: sgo ma la sogs pa'i nang nas khro bo khams gsum rnams rgyal langs te /
T02TD2200E:93b-13: bar du gcod pa'i phyir gnod sbyin smos te gang ba bzang po dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-15: ldas rtsen la sogs pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad do //
T02TD2200E:93b-16: gnod sbyin mthu bo che thams cad dang zhes pa la mthu ni rang gi 'khor rnams thams cad la 'dul sems can thams cad la shing gi yol gos chu 'thor ba'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-17: gnod sbyin drag po thams cad ni sha rlon pa rjen par tha ba'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-18: de ni lha min dang lha dang gnod sbyin ma rungs pa 'dul ba yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-22: lha ma yin thams cad dang zhes pa lha ni brgyad de /
T02TD2200E:93b-25: lha min bdag ma h'a de ba dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-28: kun du rgyug 'chi med dbang po'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-29: klu yang dga' bo la sogs pa brgyad de /
T02TD2200E:93b-31: dri za ni zur phud lnga pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-32: lha ma yin ni thags bzangs ris 'khor dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:93b-33: nam mkha' lding thams cad dang /
T02TD2200E:93b-35: lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /
T02TD2200E:94a-0: nam mkha' lding ni gser mig can 'khor dang bcas @94a * //
T02TD2200E:94a-2: / mi'am ci ni ldon pa rta mgo can la sogs pa ri rab kyi khong gseng na gnas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94a-4: mi'i lus po la sbrul gyi mgo bo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94a-5: 'byung po ni dbang ldan la sogs pa brgyad do //
T02TD2200E:94a-6: yi dags dang brjed byed la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2200E:94a-7: yi dags ni kha nas me 'bar la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94a-8: brjed byed ni byol song gi rgyal po ri rab la gnas pa rnams so //
T02TD2200E:94a-10: 'di ltar nyi ma dang zla ba dang skar ma'i tshogs lta bu bzhugs so zhes pa la nyi zla dang 'dra ba ni bden pa gnyis dang thabs shes rab dang lam gnyis la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94a-11: skar ma dang 'dra ba ni lam de dag gi yan lag gi tshogs dang thabs cig tu skar ma lta bu bzhugs zhes pa ste /
T02TD2200E:94a-12: gnas der ston pa de 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu chos gsung ngo zhes bstan /
T02TD2200E:94a-13: de ni chos phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su bstan to //
T02TD2200E:94a-14: de'i chos yang zhes pa mi snang bar gyur gyi bar la dngos su bstan /
T02TD2200E:94a-15: ston pa dang chos kyi byin rlabs yin pa'i phyir de ma gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:94a-16: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can la 'khor thams cad kyis gsol pa zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:94a-17: de nas ni chos de lta bu la ston pa bzhugs te zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94a-18: 'phags pa ni sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis spangs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94a-19: gong ma dang khyad par gyi don de ni sprul sku lag na rdo rje gos sngon lo can no //
T02TD2200E:94a-20: de la 'khor thams cad kyi nang nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba langs nas bla gos sngon po gsol te //
T02TD2200E:94a-21: gos sngon po can khyod ci zhes te /
T02TD2200E:94a-22: khyod kyi bya ba'i las dang ngo bo ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2200E:94a-23: bde gshegs kun gyi sprul pa yin nam /
T02TD2200E:94a-24: sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa'i ngo bo khyod yin nam /
T02TD2200E:94a-25: gal te sku gsung gzugs kyi bdag por bsdus pa yin nam ;
T02TD2200E:94a-26: phrin las thams cad kyi bdag por dbang bskur ba yin nam /
T02TD2200E:94a-27: bdag khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang 'khor rnams kyis bya ba /
T02TD2200E:94b-0: las bskyed rdzogs grogs dang las kyi tshogs la sogs pa ston pa'i bstan pa sangs rgyas thams cad @94b cig gi ngo bo las kyi bya rgyud ji lta bu lags /
T02TD2200E:94b-1: bdag cag gi bka' nyan gyi khyod kyi sku gsung thugs drag por bstan pa ni /
T02TD2200E:94b-2: lam nye ba ste 'khor ba las myur du sgrol zhal pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94b-3: de bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams ston pas gsungs pa nyan to zhes pa'i don to ;
T02TD2200E:94b-4: / le'u gang la ming de yod pa la de skad ces bya ste /
T02TD2200E:94b-5: gleng gzhi phun sum tshogs pa lang yod pas /
T02TD2200E:94b-6: de la dang po gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya'o /
T02TD2200E:94b-7: lag ni rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste le'u dang po'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:94b-9: // / de ltar gleng gzhi bstan kyang bskyed rdzogs kyi don ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas da ni le'u gnyis pa bstan to //
T02TD2200E:94b-10: des na lag na rdo rjes rdo rjes rdo rje drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2200E:94b-11: 'di skad gsungs so zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:94b-12: de nas zhes bya ba la ;
T02TD2200E:94b-13: de nas kyi sgra ni gleng gzhi song ba'i rting de nas /
T02TD2200E:94b-14: bar cis kyang ma cod par lag na rdo rje'i ston bsku gsungs thugs drag po'i chos gsum gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te 'di skad gsungs zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02TD2200E:94b-15: phyag rgya gsang sngags thugs sbyor la //
T02TD2200E:94b-16: khro bo'i rgyal po bsam par bya //
T02TD2200E:94b-17: khro bo rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyi //
T02TD2200E:94b-18: byin rlabs ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan //
T02TD2200E:94b-20: bal ma gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rim pa /
T02TD2200E:94b-21: phyag rgya ni srung ba dang bsod nams kyi tshogs dang ye shes dngos sam gzhal yas khang bskyed pa la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:94b-22: gsang sngags ni gzhal yas khang gi nang du seng ge dang padma la sogs pa'i steng du /
T02TD2200E:94b-23: snying rje'i stobs kyis ngo bo h'um du byung ba'o //
T02TD2200E:94b-24: thugs sbyar ni yig 'bru las phyag mtshan du gyur pa ste /
T02TD2200E:94b-26: de las sku rdzogs pa ni /
T02TD2200E:94b-27: khro bo'i rgyal po ste rdo rje rigs kyi khro bo'o //
T02TD2200E:94b-28: khro bo'i ming ni gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:94b-29: de mthong na ni khro bo gzhan //
T02TD2200E:94b-30: thams cad kyis ni lag cha 'chor //
T02TD2200E:94b-32: ri rab tu gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dus su'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-0: de rnams kyi rgyal po yin pa'i phyir @95a * //
T02TD2200E:95a-2: khro bo rdo rje'i ting 'dzin ni //
T02TD2200E:95a-3: aom a'a:h'um gis bsdus pa dang /
T02TD2200E:95a-4: bsreg pa dang sbyangs pa ste /
T02TD2200E:95a-5: sku gsum gyi lhar bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-6: byin rlabs ni lhag pa'i ye shes bstim pa dang rig pa'i dbang lnga bskur te sangs rgyas ldas gtso bo la dbang rtags su brgyan pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-7: bla ma'i rigs lha'i rang bzhin /
T02TD2200E:95a-8: a'a:h'um dkar dmar gyi ngo bo /
T02TD2200E:95a-9: gu hya aa bhi shinytsa zhes pas lce la bzhag nas gsung dbyangs yan lag brgyad cu dang ldan te /
T02TD2200E:95a-10: aa ho su kha zhes btung bar bya'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-11: des sngags bzlas pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:95a-12: ya mtshan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i dngos grub thob pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-13: yang man ngag rgya chen po dang sbyar te bshad de /
T02TD2200E:95a-14: phyag rgya ni gzhal yas khang dang gtso bo bskyed pa bstan te /
T02TD2200E:95a-15: de yang tshogs bsags pa dang /
T02TD2200E:95a-16: tshad med pa bsgom pa dang /
T02TD2200E:95a-17: aom ma h'a sh'u n+ya t'a ra dzny'a na badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham zhes pas ye shes kyi tshogs bsags te /
T02TD2200E:95a-18: de nas bsrung ba bzhi dang padma yang h'um gi cho 'phrul gyis bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-19: gsang sngags ni stong pa nyid do //
T02TD2200E:95a-20: de'i byin rlabs kyi yam ram bam lam sum bh'um las 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02TD2200E:95a-21: gzhal yas khang sgo bzhi pa dur khrod brgyad dang bcas pa phyi'i rgyan dang nang gi rgyan gyis mdzes pa bskyed do //
T02TD2200E:95a-22: de'i dbus su gdan gyis mtshan pa ste /
T02TD2200E:95a-23: gzhal yas khang de yang rin po che lnga yis brtsigs pa lha'i snam bu dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-24: der h'um gi cho 'phrul gyis cho ga gsung gi gtso bor yab yum rdzogs par bskyed pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-25: de yang yum la ni bskyed pa med /
T02TD2200E:95a-26: lus dang grib ma bzhin du rdzogs zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-27: gsang sngags ni yab yum gyi /
T02TD2200E:95a-28: ae lbam byin gyis brlabs te yab yum snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2200E:95a-29: des rigs lnga yab yum bskul te thig le dkar dmar gzhal yas khang gi nang du gsang sngags kyi ngo bo thig le dang yig 'bru bsam pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-30: thugs ni de las phyag mtshan du gyur pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-31: khro bo'i rgyal po ni de las sku rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95a-32: khro bo rdo rje ting 'dzin ni /
T02TD2200E:95a-33: gsang ba nas lha rnams spro ba bstan te /
T02TD2200E:95b-0: aom badzra kro dha @95b n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-1: aom buddha kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-2: aom ratna kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-3: aom padma kro dha n'i l'am ba ra dha ra h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-4: aom kara kro dha n'i l'am par dha ra h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-5: aom tree lo kyang bi ja ye h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-6: aom ma h'a k'a la ro shan h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-7: aom bi r'u tha ka ye h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-8: aom bee shra ba na ye h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-15: aom badzra a'a lo ke hr'i /
T02TD2200E:95b-17: som badzra am ku sha dza:/
T02TD2200E:95b-20: aom badzra bhante ho: / aom buddha t'a ki aa hr'i h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-21: aom badzra t'a ki aa hr'i h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-22: aom ratna d'a ki aa hr'i h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-23: aom padma d'a ki aa hr'i h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-24: aom karm'a d'a ki aa hr'i h'um /
T02TD2200E:95b-25: yang na kro dhi shva ri h'um zhes sbyar bar bya'o /
T02TD2200E:95b-26: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyis khro bo nam mkha' nas bton te /
T02TD2200E:95b-27: dbus kyi khro bo rang sor song nas /
T02TD2200E:95b-29: rang rang rigs kyi kha dog la //
T02TD2200E:95b-30: stag dang gos sngon sham thabs can /
T02TD2200E:95b-31: rang rang rigs kyis dbu rgyan byas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-32: khro bo rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyis zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:95b-33: shar du sangs rgyas gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:95b-34: lho ru rin chen gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:95b-35: nub tu padma gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:95b-36: byang du las kyi gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:95b-37: sangs rgyas spyan la khro bo zhal //
T02TD2200E:95b-38: phyag mtshan rnams ni kun kyang g-yas na rdo rje dang /
T02TD2200E:95b-42: rgya gram bsnams pa la g-yon pas dril bu bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-43: rnam rgyal ni sku mdog dmar po 'khor lo dang dbyug pa bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-44: mgon po yang sku mdog nag po dud ka la phyag na rin po che dang /
T02TD2200E:95b-46: 'phags skyes po yang sku mdog sngon po la phyag na mchod rten dang padma bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-47: rnams thos sras kyang sku mdog ser po la /
T02TD2200E:95b-48: phyag na mchod rten dang ne'u le bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-49: lha mo dang sgo ba yang rang rang gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan bsnams pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-50: de rnams la sku gsungs thugs byin gyis brlabs pa ni yig 'bru'am /
T02TD2200E:95b-51: phyag mtshan nam skus byin gyis brlab ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:95b-52: byin rlabs ni ye shes sems dpa' mdun gyi nam mkha' la spyan drangs te /
T02TD2200E:96a-0: bgegs bskrad pa dang mchod yon dang mchod @96a * //
T02TD2200E:96a-1: pa dang bstod pa bya ste /
T02TD2200E:96a-2: lcang lo can gyi pho brang nas //
T02TD2200E:96a-3: bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:96a-5: mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2200E:96a-6: bcom ldan sangs rgyas gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:96a-7: sku mdog dkar po skyon ma gos //
T02TD2200E:96a-8: 'khor lo dril bu phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2200E:96a-9: me long ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:96a-10: bcom ldan rin chen gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:96a-11: sku mdog ser po don rnams rgyas //
T02TD2200E:96a-12: rin chen dril bu phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2200E:96a-13: mnyam nyid ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:96a-14: bcom ldan padma gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:96a-15: sku mdog dmar po chags par ldan //
T02TD2200E:96a-16: chu skyes dril bu phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2200E:96a-17: kun rtog ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:96a-18: bcom ldan las kyi gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:96a-19: sku mdog ljang gu phrin las rgyas //
T02TD2200E:96a-20: rgya gram dril bu phyag na bsnams //
T02TD2200E:96a-21: bya grub ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:96a-22: khyams kyi cha la gnas pa ni //
T02TD2200E:96a-23: khams gsum rgyal dang mgon po gnag /'phags skyes po dang rnam thos sras //
T02TD2200E:96a-24: sprul pa sku yi tshul bstan pa //
T02TD2200E:96a-25: stong pa'i rang bzhin khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:96a-26: dkar mo sgeg dang rin chen ser //
T02TD2200E:96a-27: bi wang ma ni dmar mo ste //
T02TD2200E:96a-28: nri ti ljang gu gar rnams bsgyur //
T02TD2200E:96a-29: stong pa'i don gyis tshim mdzad pa //
T02TD2200E:96a-30: mchod pa'i lha mo khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:96a-31: shar lho lha mo bdug pa ste //
T02TD2200E:96a-32: lho nub mthing ga me tog ma //
T02TD2200E:96a-33: nub byang dmar mo gsal byed ma //
T02TD2200E:96a-34: byang shar ljang gu dri chab ma //
T02TD2200E:96a-35: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs mdzad cing //
T02TD2200E:96a-37: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril //
T02TD2200E:96a-38: bdud bzhi ma lus tshar gcod cing //
T02TD2200E:96a-39: phrin las rnam bzhi lhun grub pa //
T02TD2200E:96a-40: sgo ba bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD2200E:96a-42: smug nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can ;
T02TD2200E:96a-44: mthing nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can //
T02TD2200E:96a-46: ser nag 'bar ba'i ra la pa can //
T02TD2200E:96a-48: dmar nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can //
T02TD2200E:96b-1: ljang nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can //
T02TD2200E:96b-2: stong pa bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
T02TD2200E:96b-3: sbrul pa'i sku yi tshul ston pa //
T02TD2200E:96b-4: phyag na cang te'u kha tv'am bsnams //
T02TD2200E:96b-6: zhes pas bstod la sngags bzhis gnyis su med par bstim mo //
T02TD2200E:96b-7: dbang yang snga ma bzhin du blang ba ste //
T02TD2200E:96b-8: gong du bstan pa 'dir mi bshad do //
T02TD2200E:96b-9: des gtor ma dang bstod pa thun gyi bar du byas te /
T02TD2200E:96b-11: rin po che'i pho brang du sems pa sum brtsegs gsal bar byas te /
T02TD2200E:96b-12: grangs kyi bsnyen pa bskyal zhes pa ste /
T02TD2200E:96b-13: mtshan ma dang dus kyang yongs su shes shing gzung ngo //
T02TD2200E:96b-14: thun gyi rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa'i skabs su lam gyi sems bskyed kyang bsgom zhing bzlas so //
T02TD2200E:96b-15: sv'a h'a h'um phat ces brjod cing yongs su smin par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:96b-16: smon lam dge rtsa bsngo legs pas tshe 'di la nad dang sdug bsngal byang ste /
T02TD2200E:96b-17: thun mong kun gyi dngos grub 'byung //
T02TD2200E:96b-18: zhes bla ma rnams gsung ngo //
T02TD2200E:96b-19: de ni ya mtshan sna tshogs ldan //
T02TD2200E:96b-21: las rnams grub la the tshom med //
T02TD2200E:96b-22: zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po ste //
T02TD2200E:96b-23: gsad rmongs sna tshogs nges par grub //
T02TD2200E:96b-24: de nyid des 'grub gdon mi za //
T02TD2200E:96b-25: zhes pa la gong du bstan pa bzhin bsgrubs na /
T02TD2200E:96b-26: las sna tshogs zhi ba dang rgyas pa 'grub par the tshom mi za ste /
T02TD2200E:96b-27: rtsa ba na gsal bas ma bris so //
T02TD2200E:96b-28: des na dkyil 'khor de la gtso bo'i dbang du byas te /
T02TD2200E:96b-33: bco brgyad nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD2200E:96b-34: rtsa drug sum cu lnga'i dkyil 'khor lnga dang ni /
T02TD2200E:96b-35: mkha' 'gro bzhi'i dkyil 'khor dang drug tu 'gyur /
T02TD2200E:96b-36: rang dang gzhan gyi dkyil 'khor du bla ma mkhas pa rnams kyis bstan to //
T02TD2200E:96b-37: de dag bstan pa kun la yang //
T02TD2200E:96b-38: tshogs bsags bsrung dang lha bskyed pa //
T02TD2200E:96b-39: cho ga'i sbyor ba mkhas pas bya //
T02TD2200E:96b-41: bla ma'i man ngag la rag las pa'o //
T02TD2200E:96b-42: yang shi ba la phan gdags pa'i phyir /
T02TD2200E:96b-43: phyag rgya gsang sngags gsungs te /
T02TD2200E:96b-44: rgyas par ro bsreg cho ga nas shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:97a-0: @97a * // 'dir dang por ro la khrus byas bgegs bskrad /
T02TD2200E:97a-1: gos dang rgyan bzang po btags nas /
T02TD2200E:97a-2: rgyun 'chags dang sdom pa bzung ba yang gnyen 'dun nam pha nas bya ste /
T02TD2200E:97a-3: rol bsrung ba dang bsnyen pa bya ste /
T02TD2200E:97a-4: phyi rol du sa chog rgyas bsdus gang rung bya ste /
T02TD2200E:97a-5: dkyil 'khor gru bzhi mtha' yas par bya ste /
T02TD2200E:97a-6: thig gi cho gas thig gdab ste /
T02TD2200E:97a-7: dbus dang tshangs thig btab la thig chen dang cha chen dang cha bran legs par btab la /
T02TD2200E:97a-8: sa tshon byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2200E:97a-9: dkyil 'khor sgo gnyis rtsig pa rgyan dang bcas pa bri zhes pa'o//
T02TD2200E:97a-11: shi la phan gdags don ched du //
T02TD2200E:97a-12: sa chog ga rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam //
T02TD2200E:97a-13: sgo gnyis rdzogs nas rgyan rnams mdzes //
T02TD2200E:97a-14: mchod dang gtor ma yongs su btang //
T02TD2200E:97a-16: de nas mchod pa'i yo byang gtor ma cha gnyis la sogs pa rdzogs la /
T02TD2200E:97a-17: dkyil 'khor dbus su thab brtsigs la /
T02TD2200E:97a-18: ro shing rta'i 'khor los spyan drangs te /
T02TD2200E:97a-19: rnga dang dung dang pi wang chen po dang bcas pa'i sil snyan dang rol mos sna drangs te /
T02TD2200E:97a-20: dbang gi bum pas khrus byed cing /
T02TD2200E:97a-21: bcom ldan rdo rje gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:97a-22: sku gsung thugs kyi byin rlabs kyis //
T02TD2200E:97a-23: gshin la phan sngags don ched du //
T02TD2200E:97a-24: dbang bskur byin rlabs mdzad du gsol //
T02TD2200E:97a-25: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta n'i l'am ba ra dha rashuddha:shuddho& ham zhes brjod do //
T02TD2200E:97a-26: bsreg khang la bskor ba byas te ro bsreg khang du bzhag la /
T02TD2200E:97a-27: rang sems bskyad pa dang sngom pa gzung ba dang lhag pa'i lha'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms la /
T02TD2200E:97a-28: bde bar gshegs pa spyan drang ba dang /
T02TD2200E:97a-29: bzhugs su gsol ba yan chod bya ste /
T02TD2200E:97a-30: rdul tshon gyi steng gi nam mkha' la mchod pa dang /
T02TD2200E:97a-31: phyag 'tshal ba dang rin po che sna bdun dang rdo rje lha mos mchod pa dang /
T02TD2200E:97a-32: bstod pa la sogs pa yang yong su rdzogs par byas la /
T02TD2200E:97a-33: bsang gtor dang 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin gyis brlabs pa dang mgron bskyed pa dang /
T02TD2200E:97a-34: gtor ma dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-0: tshangs pa chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po gzugs khams lha tshogs zhes bya @97b ba la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad yang phyi rgyud bzhin brjod par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-1: de bzhin du gtor ma gnyis pa yang dga' ba'i tshal dang /
T02TD2200E:97b-2: lha rnams spyan drang ba dang byin gyis brlabs pa dang bstod pa dang sngags kyis dbul ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-4: ngan song yongs su sbyong ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2200E:97b-5: ye shes pa'i 'od zer gyis gshin gyi las sbyang ba la sogs pa bya zhes so //
T02TD2200E:97b-6: tha mar gshin dang yongs su 'brel pa'i smon lam btab la rus bu tsha tshar yongs su gdab par bya zhes 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:97b-7: de ni byin brlabs mtshan sna tshogs dang ;
T02TD2200E:97b-8: de nyid nges 'grub gdon mi za //
T02TD2200E:97b-11: phyag rgya gsang sngags thugs sbyor la //
T02TD2200E:97b-13: gsad ba'i dbang dang gsum pa dang bzhi pa dang rtsa rlung thig le dang /
T02TD2200E:97b-14: byang chub kyi sems dang rim pa lnga la sogs yang sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-15: rang gzhan 'phags dang bla ma dang //
T02TD2200E:97b-16: shin tu bla ma dam pa mchod //
T02TD2200E:97b-17: dngos grub myur du 'byung zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:97b-18: rang dam gzhan gyis 'phags pa ste /
T02TD2200E:97b-20: rang gi lhag pa'i lha la dngos sam yid kyis mchod ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-21: bla ma ni sde snod gsum ston pa'i bla ma ste /
T02TD2200E:97b-22: byin gyis rlob pa dang 'dren pa yang yongs su gsung ngo //
T02TD2200E:97b-23: shin tu bla ma dam pa ni gsang ba bla na med pa'i slob dpon te /
T02TD2200E:97b-24: de la dngos sam yid kyis mchod na /
T02TD2200E:97b-26: tshig gsum gyis ni bskyed pa'i skabs su /
T02TD2200E:97b-27: tshogs pa'i cho ga bstan to //
T02TD2200E:97b-28: gal te gzhan la phan 'dogs na //
T02TD2200E:97b-29: sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang //
T02TD2200E:97b-30: snang ba sgyu ma'i sku yin te //
T02TD2200E:97b-32: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa ni sprul sku'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-33: sku de sna tshogs sku ru snang //
T02TD2200E:97b-35: gang dang gang 'dul ba de dang de ru snang ste ;
T02TD2200E:97b-36: des de'i don byed ces pa'i don to //
T02TD2200E:97b-37: lha'i dkyil 'khor du snang ba yod pa ma yin te /
T02TD2200E:97b-38: sgyu ma'am rmi lam du snang gis don dam pa la med ces bya'o //
T02TD2200E:97b-39: 'o na sgo med na snang bar mi rigs so snyam na /
T02TD2200E:97b-40: gdug pa 'dul phyir rags pa'i skur ston to //
T02TD2200E:98a-2: dngos gzhi thar par yang dag gcig / ces pa la /
T02TD2200E:98a-3: sna tshogs dngos po'i don to //
T02TD2200E:98a-5: ngo bo ni sna tshogs par snang ba'o //
T02TD2200E:98a-7: chu rdul 'dza' yi snang ba bzhin //
T02TD2200E:98a-8: sems nyid dngos po yul du snang //
T02TD2200E:98a-10: 'o na sems nyid dngos por bden nam snyam pa la shes par snang yang shes par mi bden te /
T02TD2200E:98a-11: rigs pas brtags na snang ba nyid //
T02TD2200E:98a-12: dngos po stong pa nyid ces gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:98a-13: stong pa yang bde ba dang snang ba'o //
T02TD2200E:98a-14: snang ba yang bde stong de bzhin nyid /
T02TD2200E:98a-15: thar par yang gcig ni bden pa nyid las 'das te dngos po la bden pa gnyis po yang ma bstan ces bya'o //
T02TD2200E:98a-16: gnyis sam gcig tu yang ma grub pa ste //
T02TD2200E:98a-17: gnyis med bsam bral dngos kyi don //
T02TD2200E:98a-20: sna tshogs sems kyi cho 'phrul te //
T02TD2200E:98a-21: sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med //
T02TD2200E:98a-22: chos su snang ba 'khrul pa'i sems //
T02TD2200E:98a-23: sems nyid de yang skye med phyir //
T02TD2200E:98a-25: bsam du med de brjod du med //
T02TD2200E:98a-26: ming med tshig med yi ge med //
T02TD2200E:98a-28: le'u gnyis pa ni grangs kyi gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98a-29: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las le'u gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:98a-31: // / de ltar le'u gnyis par bdag don dang gzhan don bstan yang /
T02TD2200E:98a-32: gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2200E:98a-35: de'i phyir de la de ston to //
T02TD2200E:98a-36: de nas yang 'khor gyi nang nas khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba langs nas /
T02TD2200E:98a-37: bla gos phrag pa g-yas su sbyar nas 'di skad gsol zhes sbyar ro //
T02TD2200E:98a-39: gzhan yang gsang sngags sbyor ba yis //
T02TD2200E:98a-40: da ha bsregs sogs gsang sngags kyi ;
T02TD2200E:98a-41: / thogs med las rnams 'grub pa yin /
T02TD2200E:98a-43: gzhan yang gsang sngags sbyor ba ni //
T02TD2200E:98a-45: zhi gnas dang ting nge 'dzin gyi las ma yin te /
T02TD2200E:98a-46: rtsa sngags dang las 'grub pa dang /
T02TD2200E:98b-0: da ha zhes pas sngags sngon du @98b bstan te sreg par byed pa rtsa ba'i sngags dang /
T02TD2200E:98b-1: da ha da ha pa tsa zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:98b-2: thogs med las rnams 'grub pa ni //
T02TD2200E:98b-3: lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas sngags bzlas na /
T02TD2200E:98b-5: dper na gnam las lce 'bab pa bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:98b-6: gnyis kyi 'og ma gsum par brgyan //
T02TD2200E:98b-7: de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pas //
T02TD2200E:98b-8: zung rab zung ming dang ldan pa //
T02TD2200E:98b-9: yang ming skul dang bsam gtan ni //
T02TD2200E:98b-10: lcags kyu sbyor bas rab tu bya //
T02TD2200E:98b-12: gnyis kyi 'og ma ni shes rab kyi yi ge gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-13: gsum pa thabs kyi yi ge ring por gsum pa'o//
T02TD2200E:98b-14: brgyad ni drug pa gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-15: de la gnyis kyi gong ldan pa ni /
T02TD2200E:98b-16: thabs kyi yi ge zad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-18: ldan pa ni thabs kyi gsum pa'i mtha'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-19: grihna grihna ste zung rab tu zung ba'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-20: yang ming che ge mo zhes bya ba'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-21: bsam gtan ni lcags kyu thogs pa'i khro bo rnams so //
T02TD2200E:98b-22: rang gi lag pas lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bca' //
T02TD2200E:98b-24: sngags ni dngos su bas te /
T02TD2200E:98b-25: lha'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas /
T02TD2200E:98b-26: gong gi sngags bzlas pas 'gugs pas thogs med pa zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-27: mjug rdzogs gong dang gsum pa'i mtha' //
T02TD2200E:98b-28: lan gnyis gong bzhin brdeg sngags shes //
T02TD2200E:98b-29: zhes pas mjug rdzogs shka gsum pa thabs kyi yi ge kho na'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-31: gnyis gong bzhin ni ha na ha na zhes pa rjod pas /
T02TD2200E:98b-32: rang dang 'brel pa'i sngags brjod pas ral gri dang mtshon thogs pa'i khro bo rnams kyis gnad sar mtshon rgyob cig pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-33: gsum pa'i dang po'i gnyis pa dang //
T02TD2200E:98b-34: gong gi drug pa'i thabs yig ldan //
T02TD2200E:98b-35: ldan gnyis gong bzhin rtogs byed sngags //
T02TD2200E:98b-37: gsum pa'i dang po ni pho yig ta'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-39: gang gi drug pa ni pho yig ya'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-40: lan gnyis gong bzhin brdeg sngags shes ni /
T02TD2200E:98b-42: rdo rje rnams kyis rdungs rab tu rdungs shig pa'o //
T02TD2200E:98b-43: gnyis dang ldan pa'i dang po la //
T02TD2200E:98b-44: drag po'i dga' ba'i sa bon ldan //
T02TD2200E:98b-45: lan gnyis lan btus las 'grub par //
T02TD2200E:98b-46: gong ma bzhin du 'tshod byed do//
T02TD2200E:99a-1: gnyis pa ni thabs kyi ste /
T02TD2200E:99a-2: gtso bo dang po ste gong bzhin du shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-4: drag po dga' ba ni ha'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-5: lan gnyis ni pa tsa ha zhes pa spun gnyis so //
T02TD2200E:99a-6: las 'grub pa ni gang byas pa de 'grub pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-7: 'tshod byed ni mtshon dang tho bas shin tu tshos par sregs shig pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-8: le'u gsum pa ni grangs kyi gsum pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-9: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las le'u gsum pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:99a-11: // / de ltar sngags btu ba bshad kyang rtsa ba'i sngags dang sham bu ma bstan na gang la bya ba mi 'grub pas ;
T02TD2200E:99a-13: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2200E:99a-14: de skad gsungs so zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:99a-15: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje ni sprul sku gzhan las bya ba khyad par 'phags pa ste ;
T02TD2200E:99a-16: de ni lag na rdo rje ste /
T02TD2200E:99a-17: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'o sgrib pa yongs su spangs pas na lag na rdo rje 'phags zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-18: sna tshogs sngon po'i sku gsum sna tshogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa ni /
T02TD2200E:99a-19: las kun 'grub pa'i sngags 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:99a-20: sngags 'di sngon du bas te 'phags pa lag na rdo rje grub pa'i sngags 'di rgyun du bzlas zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-21: rgyun du rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2200E:99a-22: gdon dang sdug bsngal thams cad las //
T02TD2200E:99a-23: thar bar 'gyur ba gdon mi za //
T02TD2200E:99a-26: nyes pa kun las rab tu thar //
T02TD2200E:99a-27: legs pa'i yon tan thams cad thob //
T02TD2200E:99a-29: gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa ni sgrub pa por rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las sngags 'di 'dzin na /
T02TD2200E:99a-30: de rnal 'byor te stong pa'i don dang ldan zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-32: sdug bsngal gsum mam brgyad dang nad de las thar pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-33: legs pa'i yon tan ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad thob ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99a-35: sngags 'di gang yin ming yin te //
T02TD2200E:99a-36: gdul bya mtha' dang ldan pa la //
T02TD2200E:99b-0: tha ma las @99b sngags mtha' dang ldan //
T02TD2200E:99b-2: 'bras bu yang dag mngon par 'grub ni /
T02TD2200E:99b-3: mchog gi yon tan dang thun mong 'grub ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99b-4: sngags 'di gang yin ming yin na //
T02TD2200E:99b-5: don dam pa'i ming yin te //
T02TD2200E:99b-6: kun rdzob tu phyag na rdo rje'o //
T02TD2200E:99b-7: gdul bya'i mtha' ni che ge mo//
T02TD2200E:99b-9: phrin las bzhi yi sngags 'brel pas //
T02TD2200E:99b-10: rtsa sngags bsdongs pa de 'grub po //
T02TD2200E:99b-12: le'u bzhi pa ni grangs kyi bzhi pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99b-13: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las le'u bzhi pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:99b-15: // / rtsa ba'i sngags dang sham bu bstan kyang //
T02TD2200E:99b-16: klu'i nad dbyung ba'i gnyen po ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas /
T02TD2200E:99b-18: de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can 'od zer mngon par 'grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2200E:99b-19: 'di skad gsungs so zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2200E:99b-20: 'phags pa ni gong du bstan pas 'dir ma bshad do //
T02TD2200E:99b-21: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas zhus te /
T02TD2200E:99b-22: de nas stong pas 'od zer ni 'byung ba lnga'i 'od zer nus pa dang ldan pa de la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2200E:99b-23: klu'i nad dbyung ba'i chos 'di gsungs zhes sbyar bar bya'o //
T02TD2200E:99b-24: 'byung bzhi sangs rgyas rab bsgoms na //
T02TD2200E:99b-25: so so las kyi sgom pa ni //
T02TD2200E:99b-26: me brgyad rlung gnyis ldan par bsam //
T02TD2200E:99b-27: chu brgyad dngos po de yin te //
T02TD2200E:99b-28: de bzhin sa brgyad h'um 'bras ldan //
T02TD2200E:99b-30: 'byung bzhi'i sangs rgyas ni chu'i rdo rje gos sngon can la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:99b-31: so so las 'byung ba'i sgra 'thab pa dang /
T02TD2200E:99b-33: sngags kyang ram dang pam dang lam dang yam zhes rang rang gi gnyen po gnas brgyad du yig 'bru bsgoms te rang gi sngags bzlas zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:99b-34: 'byung bzhi ni las tha dad pa snang ba mtha' yas kyi dbang du byas te gnas /
T02TD2200E:99b-35: rkang mthil gnyis dpyi mig gnyis lag pa gnyis mdoms dang mgrin pa brgyad du /
T02TD2200E:99b-36: ram las 'byung ba'i gru gsum dmar ser brgyad bsgoms nas /
T02TD2200E:99b-38: yam las rlung brgyad kyis 'thor ba dang /
T02TD2200E:99b-39: bam las chu brgyad kyis 'khru ba dang //
T02TD2200E:100a-0: lam las sa ga zhi ser po @100a * //
T02TD2200E:100a-1: brgyad kyis brtan par bya ste /
T02TD2200E:100a-2: rin chen 'byung ldan brgyad bsams te brtan pa'i don to //
T02TD2200E:100a-3: de bzhin du 'byung ba gzhan la yang de ltar snang zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:100a-4: lugs gcig la 'byung ba bzhi'i rang bzhin nus pa sgrub pa las bstims par ston te /
T02TD2200E:100a-5: rlung brgyad me gnyis ldan pa ni //
T02TD2200E:100a-6: me gnyis rang dang khyad par gyi me ste las dang bag chags sad par byed pa'i don to //
T02TD2200E:100a-7: rlung yang steng dang 'og gi des ni me'i sngags gsum bsres te bzlas pas 'grub ste khyad par du mdze nad do //
T02TD2200E:100a-8: me gnyis po yang zab pa'i phyir bla ma'i man ngag la rag las pas 'dir ma bris so //
T02TD2200E:100a-9: 'bras bu rigs kyi gnod sbyin gtso //
T02TD2200E:100a-10: grub pa'i sngags bzhi mngon par 'grub //
T02TD2200E:100a-12: 'bras bu rim gyis ni 'byung ba bzhis nad byang nas /
T02TD2200E:100a-13: thig le bam gyis bkrus te /
T02TD2200E:100a-14: ye ge las rang lhag pa'i lha ru bskyed /
T02TD2200E:100a-15: gnas brgyad du rin chen 'byung ldan bsgo ma zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100a-16: grub pa'i sngags bzhi ni ram la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100a-17: des 'grub pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:100a-18: ae dang so so mtha' ldan pas //
T02TD2200E:100a-19: me lha gong mas mngon par 'grub //
T02TD2200E:100a-20: rgyun du rtsa ba'i gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD2200E:100a-22: ae dang ni gong du bstan pa de la ngo mtshar ba'i tshig go //
T02TD2200E:100a-23: so so'i mtha' ni 'byung ba bzhi'i sngags so //
T02TD2200E:100a-24: me lhas gong ma 'grub ni chu'i lha la sogs pa yang de bzhin du 'grub ces bstan to //
T02TD2200E:100a-25: rgyun du rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:100a-26: rgyun du de nyid ma grub kyi bar du bzlas pa ste /
T02TD2200E:100a-27: las sngags ni las kyi skabs su'o //
T02TD2200E:100a-28: le'u lnga pa ni grangs kyi lnga pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100a-29: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2200E:100a-30: le'u lnga pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:100a-32: // /'byung ba bzhi'i gso ba bstan kyang klu'i nad la phrin las bzhi'i sbyin sreg ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur ba sa de la de bstan to //
T02TD2200E:100a-33: de nas 'phags pa la lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyis las bcu'i mngon par 'grub pa'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2200E:100a-34: las bcu'i sbyin sreg 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:100a-35: 'phags pa ni gong du bstan to //
T02TD2200E:100b-0: las bcu ni phri na las @100b bzhi dang 'brel zhing bskrad pa dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-1: dmigs par bya zhing mnan pa dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-3: mi snang zhing rkang mgyogs dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-5: bsrung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-6: phrin las de la snyoms par zhugs pa'o//
T02TD2200E:100b-7: las bcu'i sbyin sreg 'di kho na gsungs zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-8: zhi la sh'antim ku ru ste zhes pa nas /
T02TD2200E:100b-9: thab khung 'dab brgyad dbyi bas yin te //
T02TD2200E:100b-10: zhes pa ni rtsa ba na gsal bas ma bris so //
T02TD2200E:100b-11: bi dhvansa ya ni dbye ba'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-12: au tsa ta na ni bskrad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-13: mo ha yas rmongs par gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:100b-15: aud ma na thun mong gi dngos grub po //
T02TD2200E:100b-17: ba shing ka ra mi mngon zhing 'gugs su gzhug pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-19: mo ha ya don grub pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-20: de la las kyi man ngag ni //
T02TD2200E:100b-21: thab zlum po dkar bo dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-22: ser po gru bzhi dang dbang zla gam dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-24: bha ga'am padma lta bu la bya zhes gsungs pa'i phyir thab ni lnga ru shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-25: ba bag na mi tra ma he tro kro da mi tha zhes pa'i me lha las dang mthun par so so'i bya ba'i rim pa dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-26: thab khung so so'i gzhal yas khang du me lha so sor bskyed de mchod cing sreg rdzas phul zhing /
T02TD2200E:100b-27: sh'antim ku ru'i sngags la sogs pa bzlas pas /
T02TD2200E:100b-28: don so sor 'grub par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:100b-30: mi tha zhes pa yongs su 'brel te /
T02TD2200E:100b-31: 'ug pa dang pho rog sha dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-33: yang na nad dmu chus shi ba'i sha dang phye ma gsum gyi thun no //
T02TD2200E:100b-34: bya rgod sha dang klag gi sha dang /
T02TD2200E:100b-36: tsandan mchod cing yongs su bsngags la pug shung sha yongs su bsregs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:100b-38: thab kung gzhal yas so so ru //
T02TD2200E:100b-39: so sor me lha spyan drangs te /
T02TD2200E:100b-40: gnyis med bstim dang mchod bya ste //
T02TD2200E:100b-41: 'phags pa gos sngon bskyed bya ste //
T02TD2200E:100b-42: so so'i me lhas dbu rgyan bya //
T02TD2200E:100b-43: mchod cing bstod na las rnams 'grub //
T02TD2200E:100b-45: de bzhin du spyan drangs pa dang mchod pa dang 'dod pa gsol ba btab pas gang la bya ba'i don 'grub par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:101a-1: drug pa ni grangs kyi drug pa'o //
T02TD2200E:101a-2: lag na rdo rje gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02TD2200E:101a-5: // / de le'u drug par sbyin sreg gi cho ga bstan yang /
T02TD2200E:101a-6: rme sreg dang dbang bskur ba ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas /
T02TD2200E:101a-7: de la de skad bstan to //
T02TD2200E:101a-8: de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:101a-9: gdul bar dka' ba 'dul ba'i mchog / gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:101a-11: de nas ni le'u drug pa bshad pa'i rting de nas so //
T02TD2200E:101a-12: dpal ldan ni rgyu ye shes las byung ba'i bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal te /
T02TD2200E:101a-13: lha mo rdo rje ting nge 'dzin pa ni /
T02TD2200E:101a-14: stong pa dang ni snying rje'o //
T02TD2200E:101a-15: gdul bar dka' ba'i gnod sbyin bas pa dang /
T02TD2200E:101a-16: klu ste gdug pa can no //
T02TD2200E:101a-17: 'dul ba ni lag ni lag na rdo rje ste /
T02TD2200E:101a-18: rin rab rtse la 'dul ba yin te sngar bshad pas so //
T02TD2200E:101a-19: gsang ba'i bdag po ni sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po ste /
T02TD2200E:101a-20: de ni sdud ba po yin par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:101a-21: drug po chen po rab tu 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02TD2200E:101a-22: 'khor gyi klu tshogs dbang sdud tshe //
T02TD2200E:101a-24: drag po ni sku gsung thugs drag por ston pas de'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2200E:101a-25: mkha' lding rgyal bos sprul ba bkye nas rgya mtsho chen por gshegs te /
T02TD2200E:101a-26: rigs bzhi'i klu yang dbang bsdus //
T02TD2200E:101a-28: nyen rnams bzlog pa'i cho gar gsungs //
T02TD2200E:101a-29: gnas khang rim pa gsum dga' //
T02TD2200E:101a-30: phyi rol rme sreg bral bar bya /
T02TD2200E:101a-31: nyen rnams ni klu dang 'byung pos zin pa sbug bsngal gyis nyen pa rnams so //
T02TD2200E:101a-32: gnas khang rim pa gsum ni khang pa rim pa gsum pa la /
T02TD2200E:101a-33: sgo shar dang nub dang lho ru 'dod do //
T02TD2200E:101a-34: phyi rol rme sreg ni khang pa phyi ba bya ba bstan to //
T02TD2200E:101a-35: gru gsum nag po'i 'brub khung du //
T02TD2200E:101a-36: tsandan dug shing bsre byas te /
T02TD2200E:101a-37: mi nag phyi tha rnams kyi mes sbar te //
T02TD2200E:101a-38: lha dang me lha gnyis med gcig tu bskyed //
T02TD2200E:101a-39: ye shes bstim dang byin brlabs bsdu ba byas //
T02TD2200E:101a-40: lha dang me gnyis med gsal byas la /
T02TD2200E:101a-41: nad pa'i steng dang 'od tu me bsam zhing /
T02TD2200E:101a-42: gnas brgyad me des bgegs kyi nus mthu rnams //
T02TD2200E:101a-43: sreg cing sna bug yongs bkab la //
T02TD2200E:101b-0: @101b slob dpon bya khyung gi ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02TD2200E:101b-1: mchod pa dang sreg rdzas phul zhing /
T02TD2200E:101b-2: klu gzir ba'i drag sngags bzlas shing /
T02TD2200E:101b-3: gu gul dang mi tshil la sogs pa'i dud pas bdug cing des bgegs med par bya zhing bral na 'bros pa'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-4: bar khang der nad pa la phyi bdud dang bdud ltas rang bzhin gyi nus pa bskyed par ston to //
T02TD2200E:101b-5: de yang yum ni lcang lo can /
T02TD2200E:101b-6: bdud rtsi bum pa thogs pa yis //
T02TD2200E:101b-8: phyi nang dgug dang bstan pa ni //
T02TD2200E:101b-9: yi ge gsum gyi las su gsungs /
T02TD2200E:101b-10: de nas aom a'a: h'um badzra a'a yu: shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2200E:101b-12: rang rang gi sngon du bdud rtsi'i ngo bos khrus bya'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-13: nang gi khrus stong pa nyid bsgom mo //
T02TD2200E:101b-14: der slob dpon la yon gyis mnyes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-15: nang du bum pa'i dbang bskur la //
T02TD2200E:101b-16: nyen rnams bzlog par the tshom med /
T02TD2200E:101b-18: dang po bsnyen pa bskyal te /
T02TD2200E:101b-19: dus grangs mtshan ma'i bsnyen po'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-20: yang na gong du bsnyen pa song bas /
T02TD2200E:101b-21: bsnyen sbyor bsgom par bya zhes so //
T02TD2200E:101b-24: slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga phyi nang 'jug pa yongs su dag par bya ste /
T02TD2200E:101b-25: dbang stegs khri la bzhag la /
T02TD2200E:101b-26: rigs dang rang rig shes pa dang /
T02TD2200E:101b-27: sbyin dang nyon mongs 'khrud par byed //
T02TD2200E:101b-28: bdag po la sogs dbang gis su //
T02TD2200E:101b-29: rgyud dag 'bras bu thob par byed //
T02TD2200E:101b-32: aom sarba ta tha ga ta n'i l'am ba ra dha ra aa bhi shi nytsa h'um /
T02TD2200E:101b-33: zhes pas me tog sngon po dang 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:101b-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta n'i l'am ba ra dha ra badzra a'a dsha aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2200E:101b-35: zhes pas chu'i dbang dang 'brel te zhes sdang rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-36: aom sarba ta th'a ta ratna badzra aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2200E:101b-37: zhes pas dbu rgyan dang 'brel pas da rgyal rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-38: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta sa manta aa bhi shinytsa h'um /
T02TD2200E:101b-39: zhes pas rdo rje dang 'brel pas 'dod chag rnam par dag pa'o //
T02TD2200E:101b-40: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta pra ti sa am na ya aa bhi shinytsa h'um/ zhes pas dril bu dang 'brel pas phrag dog sel ba'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-0: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta kri ta aa nushth'a ma aa bhi @102a * //
T02TD2200E:102a-2: zhes pas gti mug rnam par dag ste /
T02TD2200E:102a-4: de nas dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis da dang bskur zhing /
T02TD2200E:102a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi shi ka aa bhi shinytsa h'um h'um h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD2200E:102a-6: de nas las tha dad dang gsang ba'i dbang yang bskur te thig le dkar dmar lce la bzhag ste /
T02TD2200E:102a-7: gu hya aa bhi shinytsa h'um h'um h'um zhes brjod do //
T02TD2200E:102a-8: de nas slob dpon gyis lha sgoms shig pa dang sngags la sogs pa'i gnang ba sbyin pa'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-9: de yang dbang bskur ba'i rgyud nas /
T02TD2200E:102a-10: nyan cing sgrub pa la sogs pa /
T02TD2200E:102a-11: dbang bskur gnang bar ma byas na /
T02TD2200E:102a-13: de bas dbang bskur rab tu gces / zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:102a-14: de ltar byas pas sdug bsngal nad dang ngan 'gro las bzlog ces gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:102a-15: kye ho nyen rnams gdul ba'i mchog / ae ma sngags chen drag po che //
T02TD2200E:102a-18: dbang bskur ba ston pa yin te /
T02TD2200E:102a-19: dbang gi lta dang rtsa sngags 'brel par bzla pa la ngo mtshar bstod pa'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-20: ae ma sngags chen dbang dang 'brel pa'i klu 'drag sngags so //
T02TD2200E:102a-21: ae ma ma rungs 'jigs pa can ni klu'i gdon //
T02TD2200E:102a-22: dbang dan las sbyor gyis 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-23: ae ma yang gsang rnal 'byor che //
T02TD2200E:102a-24: phyag na rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:102a-25: phyogs bral khro bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:102a-27: ae ma yang gsang ni smra bcad pa'i ngo bo rdo rje shub bur bzlas pa gsang ba'i don bye ba phrag gnyis su bzlas pas //
T02TD2200E:102a-28: rnal 'byor lha dang 'brel pas rnal 'bor des bzlas zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-29: gong gi yon tan bstan pa ni khyod yin pas khyod la bstod //
T02TD2200E:102a-30: phyogs bral bi gdul bya ma lus pa dang /
T02TD2200E:102a-31: ye shes ma lus mnga' ba khyod la bstod //
T02TD2200E:102a-33: le'u bdun pa ni grangs kyi bdun pa'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-34: lag na rdo rje ba'i rgyud las le'u bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:102a-36: // gdon bral ba dang dbang bskur ba bstan kyang /
T02TD2200E:102a-37: gtor ma'i las med na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir de la de bstan to //
T02TD2200E:102b-0: yang 'khor gyi nang nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba stan @102b las langs nas /
T02TD2200E:102b-1: 'di skad zhus pa'i tshig li'u kun la sbyar ro //
T02TD2200E:102b-2: lan gsungs pas de skad gsungs nas /
T02TD2200E:102b-3: 'khor thams cad dga' ba'i rjes la 'di skad gsungs so zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:102b-4: de skad gsungs pa la gong gi tshig go //
T02TD2200E:102b-6: 'di skad gsungs ni 'og ma'i tshig rnams so //
T02TD2200E:102b-7: des de rnams gsungs par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:102b-8: thams cad ldan pa'i gtor ma la //
T02TD2200E:102b-10: phyi nang gnyis kyi gtor ma ste /
T02TD2200E:102b-11: de yang phyi'i gtor ma la /
T02TD2200E:102b-12: gtsang gtor dang bgegs gtor gnyis te dang po ni ;
T02TD2200E:102b-13: dkar gsum mdar gsum 'bras zan dang /
T02TD2200E:102b-14: ldan pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya //
T02TD2200E:102b-16: padma dkar po sdong po'i steng du /
T02TD2200E:102b-17: aom sva sv'a h'a h'um dza: aom aindra ye h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-18: aagna ye h'um dza: ya m'a ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-19: ni rri ty'a ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-20: ba ru n'a ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-22: ku be r'a ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-23: a'i sha n'a ya h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-24: he ta aa dhi pa ta ye h'um dza:/
T02TD2200E:102b-25: s'u rya tsandr'a ya h'um dza: zhes pas spyan drangs te /
T02TD2200E:102b-26: gtor ma phyi rgyud bzhin phul la /
T02TD2200E:102b-27: gong du bstan pa'i sngags kyi sham bu yang h'um ba lim ta kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02TD2200E:102b-28: aom aandi dza ma dza la dzakkha bh'u ti ba hni ya ba raksha tsanda su tsa ma ta pappa t'a ; a na t'a la atta sappa sv'a h'a ai dam ba lim bhu dza zhes pas kyang gtor ma dbul //
T02TD2200E:102b-30: stong gsum mi mdzad 'jig rten zhes pas spyan drungs la mchod pas mchod de /
T02TD2200E:102b-31: tshangs pa chen po mi mdze bdag / gzugs khams lha tshogs thams cad dang //
T02TD2200E:102b-32: chos bzangs lha yi 'dun sa na //
T02TD2200E:102b-33: rdo rje 'chang rgyal thar lam ston //
T02TD2200E:102b-34: brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2200E:102b-35: ri rab steng na lha tshogs dang //
T02TD2200E:102b-36: dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshigs bcad yang bsgrags so //
T02TD2200E:102b-37: des mchod cing smon lam bsgrags par bya'o ;
T02TD2200E:102b-38: / sha chang dang ldan pa'i gtor ma la aom aa nri su tri pre du dza zhes pa lcags kyu dang bcas pas spyan drangs la /
T02TD2200E:102b-39: gtor ma gong bzhin yang mchod pa /
T02TD2200E:102b-40: lha dang lha min gnod sbyin lto 'phye grul //
T02TD2200E:102b-41: nam mkha' lding dang 'dab bzang lus srul po //
T02TD2200E:103a-2: bu smad bcas shing g-yog 'khor bcas pa rnams //
T02TD2200E:103a-3: gnas nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir gshegs shig / srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal ba'i gnas yan chad //
T02TD2200E:103a-4: rgyud drug skye 'gro ma lus thams cad kun //
T02TD2200E:103a-5: gnas nas phan gdags phyir ni 'dir gshegs shig / ces brjod do //
T02TD2200E:103a-6: mchod pas mchod de dga' ba'i tshal dang zhes pa dang 'di ltar phan par byed pa la zhes brjod la /
T02TD2200E:103a-7: gtor ma gnyis btang ste de ni ro sreg gam rab gnas sam /
T02TD2200E:103a-8: dbang bskur dus su phyi mchod bgegs nye bar zhi ba'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-9: nang gtor ni thams cad ldan pa'i zer mas sha lnga bdud rtse lnga /
T02TD2200E:103a-13: kham gis bkrus te dag pa la zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:103a-14: ram dmar po ka p'a la dang gsang ba'i dam rdzas sreg pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-15: bsregs pa'i thal ba yam las rlung gis gtor ba'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-16: bam gyi chu rgyun gyis bkrus pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-17: yam ram dbab pa'i sbyor ba bya //
T02TD2200E:103a-18: zhes pa la yam las rlung ram las me aa las ka p'a la /
T02TD2200E:103a-19: rlung gis bteg pa'am sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bos bteg pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-20: nang du aa las zla ba'i nang du bdud rtsi lnga nyi ma'i steng du sha lnga /
T02TD2200E:103a-21: de steng gsang sngags rgyal po 'bru gsum /
T02TD2200E:103a-22: rdo rje sngon po dang shes rab a'a li dang bcas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-23: rlung bskyed me 'bar thabs shes rab zhu nas yig 'bru gsum pos sbyangs te /
T02TD2200E:103a-25: h'um gis bdag po 'od zer rtse la dza 'phros pas ye shes bdud rtsi dbab pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103a-26: aom a'a ralli ho sa ma ya dza:/
T02TD2200E:103a-27: zhes kyang brjod cing aom a'a:h'um sv'a h'a /
T02TD2200E:103a-28: zhes brjod la gtor ma byin gyis brlab bo //
T02TD2200E:103a-29: rigs drug sems can dza: zhes pas bkug la ye shes lha tshogs kyi ngo bo byin gyis brlabs la ye shes kyi lha tshogs mang po yang spyan drangs gnyis su med par bstims la bla ma yang mi bskyod par byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD2200E:103a-30: rang rang gi rtsa ba'i sngags la ba lim ta kh'a hi zhes lan bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gsum brjod la /
T02TD2200E:103b-0: ma ma sarba sha tr'um h'um aa mu ka ma hi ma tsa mo ta ba sam ba bu ga ru ti ram phra yam bksha ba li ai dam grihna hi kh'a hi rakka @103b pi ba to a'a:h'um kra ma sa ye sv'a h'a /
T02TD2200E:103b-2: aom aa k'a ros sems can thams cad la dbul /
T02TD2200E:103b-3: de nas bsam gtan lha mos mchod pa dbul //
T02TD2200E:103b-4: h'um gi 'od zer rtse la lha mo mang po byung nas mchod ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-5: gtsang gtor ni gong dang mthun pas 'di ru yang shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-6: des na dbang bsur ba'i tva nhra las /
T02TD2200E:103b-7: gtor ma'i las rnams kun la yang //
T02TD2200E:103b-8: sngon byas med cing go rims bral /
T02TD2200E:103b-9: rdzas tshogs dang bsam gtan bral //
T02TD2200E:103b-13: phyi nang gi gtor ma ngi rdzes ma 'dres par so sor tshang pa la byin gyis brlabs te bsngo zhing smon lam btab la sa btsang sar bskyal zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-14: da ni khro bo gos sngon can zhes pas dam tshig bsgrag pa ste dngos su bas /
T02TD2200E:103b-15: aa k'a ro mu kham yang kun la sbyin pa ste /
T02TD2200E:103b-17: le'u brgyad pa ni grangs kyi brgyad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-18: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las phyi nang gi gtor ma rgya cher bshad ste le'u brgyad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-20: // des phyi nang gi gtor ma btang yang sngags ma bstan na de la mos pa rnams kyis mi 'grub pas de bstan to //
T02TD2200E:103b-21: de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:103b-22: gdul ka 'dul ba'i bdag po des //
T02TD2200E:103b-23: zhes pa la de nas le'u brgyad pa song ba'i rting nge nas /
T02TD2200E:103b-24: dpal ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpal gnyis te lha mo'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-25: gdul dka' ni gong du bstan to //
T02TD2200E:103b-26: bdag po ni sbrul sku badzra p'a ni /
T02TD2200E:103b-27: bsam gtan 'khor lo med pa la //
T02TD2200E:103b-28: sngags kyi nges pa bshad par bya //
T02TD2200E:103b-30: bsam gtan ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong med pa la ste /
T02TD2200E:103b-31: rnal 'byor de la mi mos pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-32: sngags kyi nge pa ni dbye ba bshad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:103b-33: de la tadya th'a nas ba pi shuddhi zhes pa'i yig 'bru so gcig pas /
T02TD2200E:103b-35: tadya th'a buddha zhes pa nas /
T02TD2200E:103b-36: n'ag tra ta sa ta na ya phat ces pas klu gzir ba'i sme bral gyi dus sam man na cing gsad pa'i dus so //
T02TD2200E:103b-37: n'i l'am ba sa na ya phat ces pa nas /
T02TD2200E:103b-38: kun shan ma dod sa ha ya phat ces pas /
T02TD2200E:103b-39: gshin rje'i don bzlog pa dang nor bsgrub pa dang sgo lcags dbye ba dang /
T02TD2200E:104a-2: pre ta zhes pa yi dgas dang sha za bzlog par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:104a-3: yaksha zhes pas gnod sbyin bzlog par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-4: ha sa nas big sha ka ra ya phat phat kyis 'byung po spyir gsad pa ste /
T02TD2200E:104a-5: kun la sbyar bar shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-6: sarba sha tr'um ni dge 'dun gyi dgra 'dul ba ste /
T02TD2200E:104a-7: 'brub khud gru gsum pa ru gseg shang gi rtse gnyis pas brdungs te /
T02TD2200E:104a-8: sngags kyang stod smad dang yang na gsum /
T02TD2200E:104a-9: n'i l'am bar dang sang ha ni yab yum gyi sngags so //
T02TD2200E:104a-10: de la bsnyen pa dang sgrub pa la sbyar ro //
T02TD2200E:104a-11: gtubs te bzlas pa dang mi gtub pa dang /
T02TD2200E:104a-12: bde bar gshegs pa ma gsungs te /
T02TD2200E:104a-13: gang la bya ba de grub ces gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:104a-14: yang sngags rings kho na la ao tsanda ma h'a ro sha na h'um phat /
T02TD2200E:104a-15: ces rtags ni klu gdon du gyur pa la bzlas par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-16: rdo rje be con nas khyod phyag 'tshal gyis bstod pa bstan te /
T02TD2200E:104a-18: le'u dgu pa ni grangs kyi dgu pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-19: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa las le'u dgu pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-21: // klu ma khugs na gsad pa'i las mi 'grub pas dgug pa bstan to //
T02TD2200E:104a-22: de nas klu dgug pa'i sngags bstan to //
T02TD2200E:104a-23: rdo rje lcags kyu rlung gi sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:104a-24: de bzhin me yin kyang ni 'dul bar nus pa yin //
T02TD2200E:104a-26: de nas ni le'u dgu pa song ba'i rting de nas bar tshig kyang mchod par klu ni klu ring ba'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-27: rdo rje'i ring nge 'dzin dang ldan pas /
T02TD2200E:104a-28: lag na rdo rje lcags kyu'i sngags 'og ma zlos shing /
T02TD2200E:104a-29: 'og tu rlung lha rda mos bteg ste 'gugs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-30: de bzhin me yis kyang 'dul bar nus pa yin de ltar nus phyir //
T02TD2200E:104a-31: dgug pa'i sngags 'di bstan par bya //
T02TD2200E:104a-33: mi yis kyang 'dul zhes pa la /
T02TD2200E:104a-34: gnod pa'i gnas su me'i sngags dang 'brel pas sreg ste /
T02TD2200E:104a-35: de nas dgug par shes par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:104a-36: sngags ni che ge mo zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:104a-38: bsam gtan drag pos bzlas par bya //
T02TD2200E:104a-41: bsam gtan drag po ni khro bo'i cha byad can te /
T02TD2200E:104b-1: bzlas pa gri hna zhes pa dang 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:104b-2: khro bo lcags kyu thogs pa mang pos khrid nas 'ongs par gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:104b-3: klu rigs du ma thams cad kun //
T02TD2200E:104b-6: klu rigs du ma ni klu rigs bzhi'i klu dang gnyan dang sa bdag kyang yongs su gsung ngo //
T02TD2200E:104b-7: ting nge 'dzin dang sngags gong du bstan pa 'di ma yin pa gzhan gyis khug ba ma yin par bstan to //
T02TD2200E:104b-8: ji srid khug pa'i ting 'dzin gyis /
T02TD2200E:104b-9: khugs par gyur pa'i klu rnams kun //
T02TD2200E:104b-11: 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104b-12: khugs par gyur pa ni gnas nas 'ongs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104b-13: de la dam la ma btags pa'i klu la /
T02TD2200E:104b-14: skyer pa'i bam po dang sbyin sred par 'brel te /
T02TD2200E:104b-15: thab skud pa la sogs bla ma'i gdams dag la rag lus par bya'o //
T02TD2200E:104b-16: zangs zhod nang du spyan drangs te /
T02TD2200E:104b-17: zhes pa zangs gzhong du klu ba su dha ris drug gi gzugs bag zan las byas la klu sman sna tshogs yang blugs la /
T02TD2200E:104b-18: nyen pas zin pa'i gzugs la sbal pa la sogs pa bkod la /
T02TD2200E:104b-19: lcags kyi skam pa ka ya tsas //
T02TD2200E:104b-20: shing dag sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD2200E:104b-21: yongs su bcad par bya ba yin //
T02TD2200E:104b-23: smyag shad kyi lcug ma sor bcu gnyis pa /
T02TD2200E:104b-24: byis pa lo brgyad lon pas brngas te /
T02TD2200E:104b-25: rma bya'i mdongs dang tshon skud kyis bcings la /
T02TD2200E:104b-26: nyen pa rnams la byabs te /
T02TD2200E:104b-27: sbal pa yang mandala steng du phab la /
T02TD2200E:104b-28: nyen dang ldan pa lhar bsgoms te bsrung ba bya zhes pa drang 'brel te /
T02TD2200E:104b-29: de nas dam tshig bsre ba dang /
T02TD2200E:104b-30: sman gyi mchog gis tshigs bcad dang bcas pas gso ste /
T02TD2200E:104b-31: khro bo'i che ba brjod cing gnod pa ma byed par bsgo la /
T02TD2200E:104b-32: gang gnod pa'i sar bskyal zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:104b-33: le'u bcu pa ni grangs kyi bcu pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104b-34: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa'i 'grel pa las le'u bcu pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:104b-36: // dgug pa bstan kyang drag po kho na'i las ma bstan na tshar chod bar mi 'gyur bas drag po'i las bstan to //
T02TD2200E:104b-37: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste /
T02TD2200E:104b-38: zhi ba'i las kyis mi 'dul ba'i //
T02TD2200E:105a-1: gzir drag sngags bstan par bya //
T02TD2200E:105a-3: de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni khugs pa'i rting la gzhan klu gnyan sa bdag zhi bas mi nyan pa la /
T02TD2200E:105a-4: klu gzir ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin bstan to //
T02TD2200E:105a-5: dam la ma thogs pa la dang por zhi bas byas la de nas drag pos gdul zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-6: aom badzra p'a ni zhes pa nas /
