T02TD2200E:105a-7: h'um phat kyi bar gyi sngags gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:105a-8: de yang bdag gi ming dang 'brel pa las khro bo rnams kyis klu la rgyob mtshon cha rgyob ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-9: da ha ni sregs ro sregs zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-11: stobs khro bo rnams kyis non zhes pa dang shin tu non rnam par tshogs /
T02TD2200E:105a-13: 'gul mi nus par rgyob rgyob ces bya'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-14: bsam gtan rdo rje thogs pa yis //
T02TD2200E:105a-15: gdul bya'i steng nas dbab par bya //
T02TD2200E:105a-18: bsam gtan ni rang rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-19: khro bo rnams kyi sprul pa /
T02TD2200E:105a-20: rdo rje dang tho ba thogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-21: gdul bya ni steng nas khro bo rnams kyis char 'bebs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-24: gru gsum gdengs par dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'dra bar /
T02TD2200E:105a-26: bsgrub bya'i lte ba nas kyang me 'bar te bsreg pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105a-27: me dpung chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis //
T02TD2200E:105a-28: me 'bar klong chen dkyil du gzir //
T02TD2200E:105a-30: me dpung ni dus mtha'i me bas che bas sreg par 'gyur /
T02TD2200E:105a-31: gzir ba ni khro bo dang mtshon cha dang 'od zer ro //
T02TD2200E:105a-32: de yang bdag gi ting nge 'dzin rab gsal bas /
T02TD2200E:105a-33: las kyis gzhi me 'bar ba'i steng nas mtshon cha'i char babs pas /
T02TD2200E:105a-34: de dang bral bar the tshom med //
T02TD2200E:105a-36: yungs kar dang ni yungs nag gam //
T02TD2200E:105a-37: skye tshes brdeg cing khro bo spros //
T02TD2200E:105a-39: yungs kar la sogs pa'i yig 'bu khro bo mtshon cha thogs par spros te gzir ba ni khro bo rnams zhes man dag tu bstan te /
T02TD2200E:105a-41: khra spyan la sogs rtsa ba'i gsob gdab cing khro bo'i sprul pa spro /
T02TD2200E:105b-1: khra dang klag dang 'ug rgod dang /
T02TD2200E:105b-2: pho rog bya gcan lnga'i thun gyis brab cing srog cog nan brad lus rdul m'a ra ya phat ces brjod nas /
T02TD2200E:105b-3: bya khyung gi sprul pa mang pos gsang cing gzir ba'o //
T02TD2200E:105b-4: gcan gzan sna tshogs mchu sder dang /
T02TD2200E:105b-5: mchu sder 'brad cing sprul pa spo //
T02TD2200E:105b-7: stag dang seng ge dred dang ni //
T02TD2200E:105b-8: byi la spyang ki'i sder mos brad cing khro bo mang pos gcan gzan dang 'dra bas sha dang rus pa 'byed pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105b-9: myur du thar ba ni klu'i nad las myur du thar ba'o //
T02TD2200E:105b-10: le'u bcu gcig pa ni grangs kyi bcu gcig pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105b-11: lag na rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa las le'u bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:105b-13: // klu gzir ba bstan kyang mchod pa med na don mi 'grub pas mchod pa bstan to //
T02TD2200E:105b-14: de nas 'phags pa gos sngon can gyis /
T02TD2200E:105b-17: 'phags pa gos sngon ni gong du bstan to //
T02TD2200E:105b-18: nyid la nyid kyis mchod pa phul ba ni ;
T02TD2200E:105b-19: /'khor gyis gtso bo mnyes pa dang //
T02TD2200E:105b-21: rang gi rang mnyes pa dang /
T02TD2200E:105b-22: sems can tshogs rnams bsags pa'i phyir //
T02TD2200E:105b-23: nyid kyi nyid la mchod ba la /
T02TD2200E:105b-24: 'di yang mchod pa chen po ste /
T02TD2200E:105b-25: mi dmigs blo yis rab zin pas //
T02TD2200E:105b-26: bla med mchod pa zhes su grags //
T02TD2200E:105b-27: zhes lag na rdo rje rgyud phyi ma las gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:105b-28: h'um rdo rje bdug pa ma h'um zhes pa nas /
T02TD2200E:105b-29: badzra a'a lo ke'i bar gyis phyi'i mchod pa bstan te /
T02TD2200E:105b-30: de yang dang po spyan drang gdan dbul //
T02TD2200E:105b-31: phyi nang gi mchod pa mang po phul mnyes par byas te sdig pa bshags shing dge rtsa bsdo zhes gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:105b-32: bcom ldan chos dbyings rang bzhin skyon bral ba //
T02TD2200E:105b-33: chos kyi dbyings las bskyod pa mi mnga' yang //
T02TD2200E:105b-34: sgrub sogs sems can rnams la sman bya'i phyir //
T02TD2200E:105b-35: 'gro mgon sprul pa'i tshul ston gshegs su gsol //
T02TD2200E:105b-37: sengge glang chen 'khor lo padma nyi zla khri yi gdan //
T02TD2200E:105b-38: rab tu mdzes pa'i gdan ma chog dri med dbyangs //
T02TD2200E:105b-39: mthu ldan rdo rje bsnams la legs 'bul lo //
T02TD2200E:105b-40: 'gro mgon mi mchog gdan la bzhugs su gsol //
T02TD2200E:106a-2: bla ma rang bzhin gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nas //
T02TD2200E:106a-3: thub pa rgyud rnams kun gyi sdud pa po //
T02TD2200E:106a-4: log 'dren bgegs kyi tshogs rnams 'joms mdzad pa //
T02TD2200E:106a-5: bcom ldan rdo rje bsnams la skyabs su mchi //
T02TD2200E:106a-6: zhes pa tshig gi rten khyad par can 'tshal te //
T02TD2200E:106a-7: bdug spos thogs pa'i lha mo ser mo dang /
T02TD2200E:106a-8: me tog thogs pa'i dkar mo dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-9: mar me thogs pa'i dmar mo dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-10: dri chab thogs pa'i ljang gu ste //
T02TD2200E:106a-11: sngags ni mngon sum du rgyud du gsungs pas ma bris so //
T02TD2200E:106a-12: nang gi l'a s+ye m'a le k'i ti nri ni ste /
T02TD2200E:106a-13: gtso bo yang yongs su shes te nang gi nyams dang mthun par mchod cing bstod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:106a-16: rin po che sna bdun la sogs pa yang phyi rgyud dang /
T02TD2200E:106a-18: ji srid thams cad mchod pa che //
T02TD2200E:106a-19: ji srid mchod pa bde ba che //
T02TD2200E:106a-21: ji srid thams cad ni phyi rdzas ma lus pa ste /
T02TD2200E:106a-26: zhal zas la sogs pas mchod ces pa'o //
T02TD2200E:106a-27: ji srid bde ba che ba ni //
T02TD2200E:106a-28: lha mo dkar dmar ser ljang gu //
T02TD2200E:106a-29: mthing gas byang sems sha chen dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-30: rakta ba la dri chen gyis //
T02TD2200E:106a-31: rang gi nyams su bde ba bskyed //
T02TD2200E:106a-33: ji srid mchod pa bla na med //
T02TD2200E:106a-34: ji srid mchod pa yang dag che //
T02TD2200E:106a-36: ji srid bla med ni thabs shes rab zung du brel ba'i mchod pa /
T02TD2200E:106a-37: rgyas btab gnyis su med pa'o //
T02TD2200E:106a-38: ji srid yang dag ni mi dmigs pa'i mchod pa'o //
T02TD2200E:106a-39: des mchod pa'i gtso bo yang bstan to //
T02TD2200E:106a-40: de nas sdig pa bshad pa'i cho ga bya bar yang gsungs te /
T02TD2200E:106a-41: sdig pa phyis mi byed pa'i phyir /
T02TD2200E:106a-42: bla med dkon mchog gsum po dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-43: bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-44: 'khor bcas ma lus thams cad kun//
T02TD2200E:106a-45: bdag la dgongs nas gzigs su gsol //
T02TD2200E:106a-46: ji ltar dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis //
T02TD2200E:106a-47: yang dag byang chub nges mdzad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:106a-48: rnam gsum tshul khrims bslab pa dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-49: dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang //
T02TD2200E:106a-50: sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum //
T02TD2200E:106b-0: bdag gis @106b brtan por gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-1: dkon mchog dam pa bla na med //
T02TD2200E:106b-2: deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-3: rdo rje rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2200E:106b-4: rdo rje dril bu phyag rgya yang //
T02TD2200E:106b-5: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-6: slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-7: rin chen rigs mchog chen po yi //
T02TD2200E:106b-8: dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la //
T02TD2200E:106b-9: nyin re bzhin du lan drug tu //
T02TD2200E:106b-10: sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin //
T02TD2200E:106b-11: byang chub chen po las byung ba'i //
T02TD2200E:106b-12: padma'i rigs mchog dag pa la //
T02TD2200E:106b-13: phyi nang gsang ba theg pa gsum //
T02TD2200E:106b-14: dam pa'i chos kyang so sor gzung //
T02TD2200E:106b-15: las kyi rigs mchog chen po la //
T02TD2200E:106b-16: sdom pa thams cad ldan par ni //
T02TD2200E:106b-17: yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-18: bla na med pa'i byang chub sems //
T02TD2200E:106b-19: dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-20: sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir //
T02TD2200E:106b-21: sngom pa ma lus bdag gis gzung //
T02TD2200E:106b-22: ma bsgral ba ni bdag gis bsgral ;
T02TD2200E:106b-23: / ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol //
T02TD2200E:106b-24: dbugs ma phyung ba dbugs phyung bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-25: sems can dam pa'i don la dgod //
T02TD2200E:106b-26: dkyil 'khor me tog sngon por bcas //
T02TD2200E:106b-27: rdo rje bsnams la dbul bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-28: bdud rtsi rnam lnga'i gtor ma sogs //
T02TD2200E:106b-29: rnam pa kun du bsten par bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-31: chang gis myos 'gyur bdag gis spang bar bgyi //
T02TD2200E:106b-32: sems can ma lus don gyi phyir //
T02TD2200E:106b-33: snying rje chen po bdag gis bskyed //
T02TD2200E:106b-34: shes rab stong ba nyid rnams la /
T02TD2200E:106b-35: rnam pa kun du smad mi bya //
T02TD2200E:106b-36: sems can bde ba yid mi dkrug / ces pa lan gsum gyis sngom pa gzung ste /
T02TD2200E:106b-37: phyi mi byed par dam bca' ba'o //
T02TD2200E:106b-38: sngom pa blang ba ni khrims las 'dug pa dang 'dra bar bstan te nyes pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:106b-39: de nas smon lam gsum gyi tshul du bsngo ba ni //
T02TD2200E:106b-40: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam mo //
T02TD2200E:106b-41: de ni dge ba'i phyogs gzhan yang yongs su bzung ngo //
T02TD2200E:106b-42: ae ma'o ni dgyes pa dang ngo mtshar ba'o //
T02TD2200E:106b-43: se'u bcu gnyis pa ni grangs kyi bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02TD2200E:106b-44: lag na rdo rje rtse ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa las le'u bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:107a-0: // / @107a * // grogs spyod bstan kyang zhi drag dang 'byung ba bzhis bstod pa ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de la de bstan to //
T02TD2200E:107a-1: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste //
T02TD2200E:107a-2: bcom ldan gsang bdag gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:107a-4: de nas ni le'u bcu gnyis pa'i rting de nas so ;
T02TD2200E:107a-5: gzhan ni zhi drag gis klu 'dul ba'i stod pa dang /
T02TD2200E:107a-6: 'khor lo bzhis bstod pa bstan to //
T02TD2200E:107a-8: bdud bzhi 'joms shing ye shes lnga dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107a-9: des ni sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po'i rdo rje rnams yin par stan to //
T02TD2200E:107a-10: bsdu ba'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin //
T02TD2200E:107a-11: 'khor gyi klu rnams sdud mdzad nas //
T02TD2200E:107a-13: bsdu thabs ni sngon ri rab kyi rtse la gnod sbyin dang klu'i rigs 'dul ba'i tshe /
T02TD2200E:107a-14: klu dang gnod sbyin rnams bsdu ba mdzad ces bstan to //
T02TD2200E:107a-15: me yi 'khor lor snyoms zhugs nas /
T02TD2200E:107a-16: gsang ba me yi sngags bzlas pas //
T02TD2200E:107a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis me brgyad kyi 'khor lor snyoms par zhugs te /
T02TD2200E:107a-20: klu rnams skrag par bya ba'i don /
T02TD2200E:107a-21: me'i rang bzhin me'i sngags bzlas pas /
T02TD2200E:107a-22: klu rnams 'dul bar tshig 'og ma rnams dang 'brel to //
T02TD2200E:107a-23: klu rnams ma lus tshim par mdzad //
T02TD2200E:107a-24: bral nas dpag tshad gnas su bros //
T02TD2200E:107a-26: bcom ldan 'das me'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa /
T02TD2200E:107a-27: 'khor gyi klu rnams la 'dir gnas na me 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar 'gyur snyam pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung /
T02TD2200E:107a-29: bdag gi 'khor na mi gnas par 'bros te 'gro //
T02TD2200E:107a-30: bog ste 'gro ba ni dpag tshad dang rgyang grags su 'byer ba'o //
T02TD2200E:107a-31: slar 'dus bdud rtsi sman gyis gso //
T02TD2200E:107a-32: las bcol so so'i gnas su dgod //
T02TD2200E:107a-34: slar zhi ba'i thugs rjes bsdus te ye shes bdud rtsis gsos te /
T02TD2200E:107a-35: gnod pa ma byed par bka' bsgo nas /
T02TD2200E:107a-36: rang rang gi gnas su bskyal zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107a-37: de bzhin du klu'i gdon gyis nyen pa rnams la ni /
T02TD2200E:107a-38: me'i ting nge 'dzin me brgyad kyi 'khor lo la gnas nas me'i sngags bzlas pas /
T02TD2200E:107b-0: 'chi snyam pa'i 'jigs pa dang bral zhing @107b 'gro /
T02TD2200E:107b-1: dpag tshad du byer zhing 'gro zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-2: gnod pa mi byed pa'am dam la thogs pa'i klu rnams la ni slar bdud rtsi sman gyis gso /
T02TD2200E:107b-3: de nas klu nad gso ba rnams kyi nang na ni me yis gso ba /
T02TD2200E:107b-4: dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis gsungs pa bde na pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-6: de nas 'khor rnams kyi nang nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba stan las langs te /
T02TD2200E:107b-7: byung ba bzhi'i bstod pa gsungs pa /
T02TD2200E:107b-8: thal mo sbyar ba ni dngos te /
T02TD2200E:107b-10: mo brgyad 'khor lo bdag nyid che //
T02TD2200E:107b-11: rtag tu me yi ting nge 'dzin la //
T02TD2200E:107b-12: snyoms 'jug khyod ni rgyal gyur cig /
T02TD2200E:107b-13: ces pa la gnas brgyad ka rkang mthil gnyis /
T02TD2200E:107b-14: lag mthil gnyis dpyi mig gnyis /
T02TD2200E:107b-15: gsang ba dang mgrin pa gnyis te brgyad nas ram las byung ba'i dmar ser brgyad gnas pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-17: rtag tu ni de'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas na snyoms par zhugs nas brgyal zhing 'jigs pa ste /
T02TD2200E:107b-18: lhan cig mi gnas pa'i 'gal ba bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:107b-19: bde ba'i rol mo me klong du //
T02TD2200E:107b-20: sreg mdzad med brgyad khyod phyag tshal //
T02TD2200E:107b-21: rang bzhin mnga' bdag khyod phyag tshal //
T02TD2200E:107b-23: bde ba'i rol mo me klong ni ye shes kyi me dang ldan pas nyon mongs pa sreg pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-24: sreg pa ni nad dang nyon mongs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-25: yang smin cing sel bas na me la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2200E:107b-26: des ni khyod las mi da bar ston to //
T02TD2200E:107b-27: rang bzhin nus pa de yod pas khyod phyag 'tshal zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-28: chu yi ngang la gnas dod na //
T02TD2200E:107b-29: chu brgyang ting 'dzin la gnas te //
T02TD2200E:107b-31: de dang 'dra ba'i nad dang nyon mongs pa zhi bar dod na /
T02TD2200E:107b-32: chu brgyad ni gong gi gnas brgyad du bam dkar po las chu bsgoms pas nad sel /
T02TD2200E:107b-34: chu brgyad 'khor lo bdag nyid che //
T02TD2200E:107b-35: rtag par chu yi dkyil 'khor can ;
T02TD2200E:107b-37: 'khor rnams ni rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-38: des nus pa chu dang 'dra ba'i sgo nas bstod /
T02TD2200E:107b-39: chu brgyad 'khor lo ni gnas brgyad nas khrung pa'o //
T02TD2200E:107b-40: rtag tu 'khrung par byed pa'i nus pa yod pas /
T02TD2200E:108a-2: mnga' bdag gtso bo khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:108a-4: 'byung ba'i gtso bo chu yin te /
T02TD2200E:108a-5: de dag gi gtso bo gos sngon po yang de dang 'dra zhes so //
T02TD2200E:108a-6: mnga' bdag gi gtso bo khyod rang bzhin nam nus pa de dang ldan pas khyod phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2200E:108a-7: rlung brgyad ting 'dzin la gnas pas //
T02TD2200E:108a-9: zhes pas ni gnas brgyad du bsregs pa'i shul rlung brgyad kyis 'thor ba'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-10: gzhan de'i nus pa'i dug 'thor ba ste gong ma'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-11: 'thor zhing 'bud pas na rlung dang 'dra ba'i nus pas 'thor zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-12: che ba ste spobs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-13: rlung chen drag po rtsal shugs can //
T02TD2200E:108a-14: rlung lha gos sngon khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:108a-16: chen po ni ye shes kyi rlung ngo //
T02TD2200E:108a-17: drag po rtsal shugs ni thogs pa med pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-18: rlung lha gos sngon can ni //
T02TD2200E:108a-19: dngos te de la de'i nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
T02TD2200E:108a-20: sa yi dkyil 'khor la gnas nas //
T02TD2200E:108a-21: mi ga+yo brtan pa'i las mdzad pa //
T02TD2200E:108a-23: sa ni gzhan gyi nus pa gnon pa ste gzhan gyi nus pa gnon pa'i tshes dang 'dra ba la gnas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-24: mi ga+yo ba ni bdag nyid la tshur mi brdzi ba'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-25: brtan pa ni mis mi ldan zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-26: gser ldan rol mo sna tshogs bdag / sa bdag 'khor bdag khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02TD2200E:108a-28: gnon pa'i tshe gser gyi 'khor lo dang 'dra ba'i phyir te /
T02TD2200E:108a-29: rol mo ni des snang ba'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-30: sna tshogs ni 'byung ba bzhis 'dul ba'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-31: sa brgyad kyi 'khor lo gnas brgyad du'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-32: khyod ni de'i rang bzhin yin pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD2200E:108a-33: le'u bcu gsum pa ni grangs kyi bcu gsum pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-34: lag na rdo rje rtsa pa'i rgyud las le'u bcu gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108a-35: de ltar bskyed pa dang grogs spyod bstan kyang /
T02TD2200E:108a-36: rdzogs rim ma bstan na 'grub par mi 'gyur bas de bstan to //
T02TD2200E:108a-37: de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:108a-38: phra mo'i ting 'dzin la gnas pa //
T02TD2200E:108a-40: de nas de'u bcu gsum pa song ba'i rting de nas /
T02TD2200E:108a-41: yon tan gnyis dang ldan pa'i gos sngon can des /
T02TD2200E:108b-0: phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin ni dpe'i ye @108b shes dang /
T02TD2200E:108b-1: las dang lam gyi ye shes ma yin te /
T02TD2200E:108b-2: 'bras bu phyag rgya chen po la gnas nas zhes bshad do //
T02TD2200E:108b-3: lam yang mtshan bcas dang mtshan med do //
T02TD2200E:108b-4: phra mo stong nyid goms pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-5: snang ba dngos su med pa ste //
T02TD2200E:108b-6: snang ba stong ba'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD2200E:108b-7: stong la bde ba'i rig pa'o ;
T02TD2200E:108b-8: / de ni snang ba dngos su bstan //
T02TD2200E:108b-9: thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel //
T02TD2200E:108b-10: mi rtog spros bral goms pa ni //
T02TD2200E:108b-11: mtshan med lam du bstan pa yin //
T02TD2200E:108b-12: skye ba rmi lam bar do nas //
T02TD2200E:108b-13: srid pa bar do gsum du'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-14: de yang mi rtog spros bral lo //
T02TD2200E:108b-15: de ni gsang ba'i srid pa'i lung las //
T02TD2200E:108b-16: srid gsum rang bzhin 'pho ba yang //
T02TD2200E:108b-19: mtshan bcas kun brtags rtsa rlung gi /'khor gyi gnod spyin mang po kun //
T02TD2200E:108b-20: shin tu yid dga' dang bas zhus //
T02TD2200E:108b-22: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun ni gnod sbyin du ma'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-23: gong du bstan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la dga' nas /
T02TD2200E:108b-24: 'khor gyi nang nas rnam par rgyal bzhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-25: phra mo thig le chen po yis //
T02TD2200E:108b-26: cir snang dngos po gcig tu 'dus //
T02TD2200E:108b-27: de nyid mtha' 'das rang bzhin med //
T02TD2200E:108b-29: phra mo thig le chen po ni //
T02TD2200E:108b-30: spyi bo dang ni mgrin pa dang //
T02TD2200E:108b-31: snying ga dang ni lte ba dang //
T02TD2200E:108b-32: gtum mo rlung gi 'khor lo rnams so //
T02TD2200E:108b-33: rang 'byung gi yi ge gnas pa ni thig le'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-34: phra ba ni a'a li dang ldan pa'i rtsa la rlung bus te /
T02TD2200E:108b-35: thig le las me 'bar te bde ba /
T02TD2200E:108b-37: mchog tu bde ba bskyed pa ni phra ba'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-38: ting nge 'dzin de la ming de yod pas de skad ces bya'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-39: ci snang dngos po ni kun du rtog pa thams cad 'bar ba stong ba nyid du zhu zhes pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-40: de nyid mtha' 'das ni lam chos kyi phyag rgya 'od gsal nyams su blangs pas de ni lam gyi 'od gsal zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-41: rang bzhin med ni 'bras bu chos kyi sku thob pa'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-43: bral bas rang bzhin med ces bya'o //
T02TD2200E:108b-45: sbrul pa bde chen longs spyod chos //
T02TD2200E:108b-46: rlung dang me la rab gnas pas //
T02TD2200E:108b-47: mtha' 'das rang bzhin chos sku thob //
T02TD2200E:109a-2: / de nas dpal ldan gos sngon can //
T02TD2200E:109a-3: bla med rdzogs pa'i klong chen du //
T02TD2200E:109a-6: sems can chags pa can drangs pa'i phyir //
T02TD2200E:109a-7: thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa bstan te /
T02TD2200E:109a-8: ri rab kyi rtse la dpal ldan gos sngon can ni khro mo rdo rje sreg ma dang snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshul bstan to //
T02TD2200E:109a-9: sangs rgyas gos sngon can ni rdo rje gsang ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02TD2200E:109a-10: rin po che'i mtshan gos sngon can ni rdo rje zhi ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02TD2200E:109a-11: padma gos sngon can ni khro mo dag byed ma dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02TD2200E:109a-12: las kyi gos sngon can ni rdo rje rgyal ba mo dang snyoms par zhugs so //
T02TD2200E:109a-13: de dga' ba bzhi rnam par dag pa skye ba'i tshul bstan te /
T02TD2200E:109a-14: de ni 'dod pa la zhen pa rnams rab tu 'joms pa'o //
T02TD2200E:109a-15: lung las rdo rje khro bo rnams dang sbyor //
T02TD2200E:109a-18: dga' bzhi'i tshul dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD2200E:109a-19: des kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:109a-21: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po kun //
T02TD2200E:109a-22: gnas dang dus dang rgyal ba las //
T02TD2200E:109a-24: 'khor gyi gnod sbyin mang po chags pa dang bral ba'i rigs so //
T02TD2200E:109a-25: de lta bu'i spyod pas sangs rgyas mthong bas 'di ni tha mal pa spyod pa'i 'khor ba'i lam zhes smra zhing sngangs pa dang /
T02TD2200E:109a-26: dus thob pa'i thabs med do zhes zer nas brgyal ba'o //
T02TD2200E:109a-27: bslang ste bla med don bstan pas //
T02TD2200E:109a-28: thams cad 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas //
T02TD2200E:109a-30: bam sam sa ma ya ho //
T02TD2200E:109a-31: zhes brjod nas brgyal ba kun bslangs /
T02TD2200E:109a-32: bla na med pa pho nya'i lam dga' ba bzhi dngos po lam stong pa nyid bzhi lam la btsud pas chags pa dang bral ba'i gnod sbyin kun pho nya'i lam las sangs rgya shing 'bras bu thob bo //
T02TD2200E:109a-33: des na 'dod chags mngon sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
T02TD2200E:109a-34: 'khor gyis sku la bstod pa ni //
T02TD2200E:109a-35: 'khor lhag ma rnams yi rangs te /
T02TD2200E:109a-36: bstod pa gsungs pa kye ho zhes gtso bo ye shes la bstod do //
T02TD2200E:109a-37: de nas bstod pa bzhi ngo bos rtogs pa thams cad 'dag pa ste /
T02TD2200E:109a-38: bstod pa gcig ni rtsa ba nags la bas ma bris so //
T02TD2200E:109b-0: snyoms @109b bar 'jug pa nas thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel ba'i mngon shes sel ba'i 'dod chags ni /
T02TD2200E:109b-1: sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i lam //
T02TD2200E:109b-2: bstod ba'i gnas su 'di gsungs so //
T02TD2200E:109b-4: le'u bcu bzhi ba ni grangs kyi bcu bzhi ba'o //
T02TD2200E:109b-5: lag na rdo rje rtse ba'i rgyud rgya cher bshad pa las le'u bcu bzhi ba'i bshad pa'o /
T02TD2200E:109b-8: // / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams zhes pa nas 'khor gyis gtso bo la bstod pa nas bla med skyabs mdzad kyi bar la /
T02TD2200E:109b-9: khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas gtso bo la bstod pa bstan te /
T02TD2200E:109b-10: nyams su blang ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2200E:109b-11: gtso bo la mos pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD2200E:109b-12: tshig don yin pas rgyud dngos su bstan pas bshad pa ni ma byas so //
T02TD2200E:109b-13: yi rang ba ni ston pa'i chos gsum du bstan pa la mos pas yi rang ba ste /
T02TD2200E:109b-14: lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa yang yid dga' ba'i mchod pas khyab par gyur to zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2200E:109b-17: glu ni dga' bo la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:109b-18: lha ma yin ni thags bzangs la sogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:109b-19: mi'am ci ni rta mgo can dang /
T02TD2200E:109b-23: lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa rnams byang chub sems dang ldan zhing /
T02TD2200E:109b-24: stong pa nyid kyi don zab mo la mos pa'o//
T02TD2200E:109b-25: mi la sogs pa thams cad 'jig pa'i rten dang ldan pa thams cad de ba la bkod do zhes bya ba la /
T02TD2200E:109b-26: ri rab kyi rtse la rgyud 'di bshad pas /
T02TD2200E:109b-28: mi dang lha dang klu dang lha ma yin la sogs pa rnams nad las grol bar gyur to //
T02TD2200E:109b-29: bde gshegs zhal nas gsungs pa'i rgyud rnams la //
T02TD2200E:109b-30: bshad cing man ngag 'grel par byas pa rnams //
T02TD2200E:109b-31: kun la don dang ngag gi skyon rnams yod pa ste //
T02TD2200E:109b-32: bzang por sems kyang skyon te de ni rang gi khengs pa'i sems //
T02TD2200E:109b-33: dper na 'dam gyi sengge sengge yin zhes nya rnams smra /
T02TD2200E:109b-35: des na 'dir ni rgyud kyi dgongs pa la /
T02TD2200E:109b-36: skyes dang lhag pa'i mthong las tshogs pa gsum du 'dus /
T02TD2200E:109b-37: bskyed pa'i rgyas pa bsdus dang shin tu bsdus par gsungs //
T02TD2200E:109b-40: rim gyis bskyed dang cig car gyis //
T02TD2200E:109b-41: gang zag blo yis rim par gsungs//
T02TD2200E:110a-0: @110a * // rdzogs pa gnyis su bstan pa yang //
T02TD2200E:110a-1: mtshan bcas dang ni mtshan med do //
T02TD2200E:110a-2: mtshan bcas kun brtags lam du byed //
T02TD2200E:110a-3: rtsa rlung byang chub sems kyis su //
T02TD2200E:110a-4: rim gyis ye shes skye bar 'dod //
T02TD2200E:110a-5: mtshan med nyams su skye lugs kyang //
T02TD2200E:110a-6: mi rtog stong pa nyams su blang //
T02TD2200E:110a-7: stong pas stong pa goms par byed //
T02TD2200E:110a-8: skad cig goms sogs spangs pa yis //
T02TD2200E:110a-9: lam lnga dang ni lam gnyis bgrod //
T02TD2200E:110a-11: dri bcas dang ni dri ma med //
T02TD2200E:110a-12: 'di ni thar pa'i lam la gnas //
T02TD2200E:110a-13: dri bcas dpe yi ye shes tshol //
T02TD2200E:110a-14: drod dang rtse mo chos mchog rnams /
T02TD2200E:110a-15: ma rtogs mthong lam skye ba med //
T02TD2200E:110a-16: mthong lam skad cig bcu drug gis //
T02TD2200E:110a-17: mthong spangs nyon mongs spong bar byed //
T02TD2200E:110a-18: gnyen po ye shes bcu drug go //
T02TD2200E:110a-19: nyi ma grib ma tshul du spong //
T02TD2200E:110a-20: chos ni snang bar gsal ba'o //
T02TD2200E:110a-21: skad cig phyi ma snang ba mched //
T02TD2200E:110a-22: mthong lam ye shes ma mthong mthong //
T02TD2200E:110a-23: snang ba stong par thob pa'o //
T02TD2200E:110a-24: drod rtse la sogs gnyis kyi rten //
T02TD2200E:110a-25: nges par byed pa'i cha brgyad pos //
T02TD2200E:110a-26: sgom pa spong ba'i nyon mongs spong //
T02TD2200E:110a-27: 'di ni drod spang bsgom pa'i lam //
T02TD2200E:110a-28: rgyu yi theg par rab bstan pa'i ;
T02TD2200E:110a-29: / lam lnga rim gyis bgrod mi dgos //
T02TD2200E:110a-30: 'di ru lam lnga gsungs pa yang //
T02TD2200E:110a-31: ye shes skye ba'i bgrod tshul lo //
T02TD2200E:110a-32: grogs ni tshogs kyi gtor ma dang //
T02TD2200E:110a-34: zhi gnas lhag mthong skye ba'i rgyu //
T02TD2200E:110a-35: rgyu la ma brten 'bras pu med //
T02TD2200E:110a-36: dper na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin //
T02TD2200E:110a-38: de ni mi rigs smra ba ste //
T02TD2200E:110a-39: ri bong rva sogs tshang 'jal bzhin //
T02TD2200E:110a-40: legs par bstan kyang don med 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:110a-43: rgyu las 'bras bu dngos yod na//
T02TD2200E:110a-45: gal te rgyu yis 'bras bskyed na /
T02TD2200E:110a-46: 'bras bu dus su rgyu med pas //
T02TD2200E:110a-47: rgyu 'bras lhan cig mi gnas pas //
T02TD2200E:110a-48: phan tshun spangs pa mi gnas 'gyur //
T02TD2200E:110a-50: rgyu yang mthong lam ye shes te //
T02TD2200E:110b-1: stong nyid bde ba'i ye shes dang //
T02TD2200E:110b-2: skad cig goms sogs nyams blangs pas //
T02TD2200E:110b-3: rgyu 'bras gnyis med bgrod pa ni //
T02TD2200E:110b-4: 'bras bu gsang sngags thob lugs so //
T02TD2200E:110b-5: skad cig goms pa rgyu yin te //
T02TD2200E:110b-6: goms pa mthar sngon rtogs pa'o //
T02TD2200E:110b-7: rgyu las rten byung shugs kyis rtogs //
T02TD2200E:110b-9: kho bo gzhung gis de skad smras //
T02TD2200E:110b-11: bden pa gnyis su rab bstan pa //
T02TD2200E:110b-12: blo yi rtogs tshul bye brag go //
T02TD2200E:110b-13: gnyis bral yang dag rtogs tshul ni //
T02TD2200E:110b-14: bla med don la gnas zhes gsungs//
T02TD2200E:110b-15: des ni rgyud kyi sdom tshig ni //
T02TD2200E:110b-16: gnyis dang gsum du dus par gsungs //
T02TD2200E:110b-17: bdag 'dra dman pa'i gang zag gis //
T02TD2200E:110b-18: sa ma non cing yid ma zhal ma mthong //
T02TD2200E:110b-19: yang sprul mkha' 'gro rnams dang bde gshegs lam //
T02TD2200E:110b-20: rang nyid gos sngon can la mos pa yis //
T02TD2200E:110b-21: rang la brten dang thar pa'i lam //
T02TD2200E:110b-22: rang bas blo zhan rnams la phan par bya phyir dang //
T02TD2200E:110b-23: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD2200E:110b-24: dgongs pa mchad bya phyir dang //
T02TD2200E:110b-25: snying rje gnyis med sogs kyi mtshams //
T02TD2200E:110b-26: man ngag tshig don rgyas par bstan //
T02TD2200E:110b-27: tshig la nyes pa med de snga ma snga dang gsang sngags dag tu sbyar //
T02TD2200E:110b-28: de gzhan med de 'di la dga' ba skyes //
T02TD2200E:110b-29: gal te bdag gis khro tshig dang //
T02TD2200E:110b-30: don la nyes pa shor srid na //
T02TD2200E:110b-31: dus gsum rigs lnga'i bde bag gshegs pa dang //
T02TD2200E:110b-32: mkha' shing shes pa rnams la bzod par gsol //
T02TD2200E:110b-33: dad pa tshe la gyong khengs med//
T02TD2200E:110b-34: sgang bu dma' la 'gro don rtsom //
T02TD2200E:110b-35: snying rje shes rab che rtsom zhing //
T02TD2200E:110b-36: gsang sngags chos dang bla ma la ni gus //
T02TD2200E:110b-37: dbang bskur thob cing dam tshig ldan sogs pa //
T02TD2200E:110b-38: de la gong ma'i man ngag rgyun ma chad par sbyin //
T02TD2200E:110b-39: de ma byin na gsang sngags dam tshig nyams //
T02TD2200E:110b-41: rdzogs ldan dus kyi tha ma la //
T02TD2200E:110b-42: rtsa ba dang chad snying rje bral /
T02TD2200E:110b-43: khva ltar bu cor smra zhing gsang sngags phrag khyer ba //
T02TD2200E:110b-44: de la sogs pa gang zag rnams la nor la bltas te byin //
T02TD2200E:110b-45: 'phen byed las kyis 'phangs na rdo rje dmyal bar skye //
T02TD2200E:111a-0: rdzogs byed las kyis dan song @111a * //
T02TD2200E:111a-3: mnar med dan song du skye 'bras bu tsha grang sdug bsngal myong //
T02TD2200E:111a-4: thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel ba'i //
T02TD2200E:111a-5: nyi zla lta bu'i dam chos 'di //
T02TD2200E:111a-6: bden pa gnyis dang mi 'gal gsang sngags 'bras bu'i lam //
T02TD2200E:111a-7: chos 'di legs par bris pas khams gsum sems can rnams //
T02TD2200E:111a-8: drod dang rtse mo bzod pa'i chos kyi rtse //
T02TD2200E:111a-9: ye shes bzhi yi tshul gyis nyon mongs sdug bsngal zhi //
T02TD2200E:111a-10: mthong sgom sgrib pa rnams dang bral ba dang //
T02TD2200E:111a-11: sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad dang yongs bral ba'i //
T02TD2200E:111a-12: mdze 'bras nad dang bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi sogs //
T02TD2200E:111a-13: sdug bsngal rab zhi myur du bde bar shog / bdag dang khams gsum sems can rnams //
T02TD2200E:111a-14: sdug bsngal ma lus rab zhi nas //
T02TD2200E:111a-15: gos sngon dngos grub thob par shog /'phags pa gos sngon po can gyi rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T02TD2200E:111a-17: // / skye ba lnga brgyar blo rab sbyangs //
T02TD2200E:111a-18: sngags kyi theg pa'i bstan bcos 'di //
T02TD2200E:111a-19: dbu ma'i lta ba yang dag ste //
T02TD2200E:111a-20: mkhas btsun rnams kyis yongs su gzung //
T02TD2200E:111a-21: sgrol ma gsal ba zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa dge slong klu'i byang chub kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
